verses.sanskrit_deva: अबो॑ध्य॒ग्निः स॒मिधा॒ जना॑नां॒ प्रति॑ धे॒नुमि॑वाय॒तीमु॒षास॑म् य॒ह्वा इ॑व॒ प्र व॒यामु॒ज्जिहा॑नाः॒ प्र भा॒नवः॑ सिस्रते॒ नाक॒मच्छ॑
verses.transliteration: ábodhy agníḥ samídhā jánānām  práti dhenúm ivāyatī́m uṣā́sam  yahvā́ iva prá vayā́m ujjíhānāḥ  prá bhānávaḥ sisrate nā́kam ácha

translation.text: Agni is wakened by the people's fuel to meet the Dawn who cometh like a milch-cow. Like young trees shooting up on high their branches, his flames are rising to the vault of heaven.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अबो॑धि॒ होता॑ य॒जथा॑य दे॒वानू॒र्ध्वो अ॒ग्निः सु॒मनाः॑ प्रा॒तर॑स्थात् समि॑द्धस्य॒ रुश॑ददर्शि॒ पाजो॑ म॒हान्दे॒वस्तम॑सो॒ निर॑मोचि
verses.transliteration: ábodhi hótā yajáthāya devā́n  ūrdhvó agníḥ sumánāḥ prātár asthāt  sámiddhasya rúśad adarśi pā́jo  mahā́n devás támaso nír amoci

translation.text: For worship of the Gods the Priest was wakened: at morning gracious Agni hath arisen. Kindled, his radiant might is made apparent, and the great Deity set free from darkness.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यदीं॑ ग॒णस्य॑ रश॒नामजी॑गः॒ शुचि॑रङ्क्ते॒ शुचि॑भि॒र्गोभि॑र॒ग्निः आद्दक्षि॑णा युज्यते वाज॒यन्त्यु॑त्ता॒नामू॒र्ध्वो अ॑धयज्जु॒हूभिः॑
verses.transliteration: yád īṃ gaṇásya raśanā́m ájīgaḥ  śúcir aṅkte śúcibhir góbhir agníḥ  ā́d dákṣiṇā yujyate vājayántī-  uttānā́m ūrdhvó adhayaj juhū́bhiḥ

translation.text: When he hath stirred the line of his attendants, with the pure milk pure Agni is anointed. The strength-bestowing gift is then made ready, which spread in front, with tongues, erect, he drinketh.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निमच्छा॑ देवय॒तां मनां॑सि॒ चक्षूं॑षीव॒ सूर्ये॒ सं च॑रन्ति यदीं॒ सुवा॑ते उ॒षसा॒ विरू॑पे श्वे॒तो वा॒जी जा॑यते॒ अग्रे॒ अह्ना॑म्
verses.transliteration: agním áchā devayatā́m mánāṃsi  cákṣūṃṣīva sū́rye sáṃ caranti  yád īṃ súvāte uṣásā vírūpe  śvetó vājī́ jāyate ágre áhnām

translation.text: The spirits of the pious turn together to Agni, as the eyes of all to Sûrya. He, when both Dawns of different hues have borne him, springs up at daybreak as a strong white charger.

verses.sanskrit_deva: जनि॑ष्ट॒ हि जेन्यो॒ अग्रे॒ अह्नां॑ हि॒तो हि॒तेष्व॑रु॒षो वने॑षु दमे॑दमे स॒प्त रत्ना॒ दधा॑नो॒ऽग्निर्होता॒ नि ष॑सादा॒ यजी॑यान्
verses.transliteration: jániṣṭa hí jényo ágre áhnāṃ  hitó hitéṣv aruṣó váneṣu  dáme-dame saptá rátnā dádhāno  -agnír hótā ní ṣasādā yájīyān

translation.text: The noble One was born at days' beginning, laid red in colour mid the well-laid fuel. Yielding in every house his seven rich treasures, Agni is seated, Priest most skilled in worship.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निर्होता॒ न्य॑सीद॒द्यजी॑यानु॒पस्थे॑ मा॒तुः सु॑र॒भा उ॑ लो॒के युवा॑ क॒विः पु॑रुनि॒ष्ठ ऋ॒तावा॑ ध॒र्ता कृ॑ष्टी॒नामु॒त मध्य॑ इ॒द्धः
verses.transliteration: agnír hótā ny àsīdad yájīyān  upásthe mātúḥ surabhā́ uloké  yúvā kavíḥ puruniṣṭhá r̥tā́vā  dhartā́ kr̥ṣṭīnā́m utá mádhya iddháḥ

translation.text: Agni hath sat him down, a Priest most skilful, on a sweet-smelling place, his Mother's bosom. Young, faithful, sage, preeminent o'er many, kindled among the folk whom he sustaineth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र णु त्यं विप्र॑मध्व॒रेषु॑ सा॒धुम॒ग्निं होता॑रमीळते॒ नमो॑भिः आ यस्त॒तान॒ रोद॑सी ऋ॒तेन॒ नित्यं॑ मृजन्ति वा॒जिनं॑ घृ॒तेन॑
verses.transliteration: prá ṇú tyáṃ vípram adhvaréṣu sādhúm  agníṃ hótāram īḷate námobhiḥ  ā́ yás tatā́na ródasī r̥téna  nítyam mr̥janti vājínaṃ ghr̥téna

translation.text: This Singer excellent at sacrifices, Agni the Priest, they glorify with homage. Him who spread out both worlds by Law Eternal they balm with oil, strong Steed who never faileth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: मा॒र्जा॒ल्यो॑ मृज्यते॒ स्वे दमू॑नाः कविप्रश॒स्तो अति॑थिः शि॒वो नः॑ स॒हस्र॑शृङ्गो वृष॒भस्तदो॑जा॒ विश्वाँ॑ अग्ने॒ सह॑सा॒ प्रास्य॒न्यान्
verses.transliteration: mārjālyò mr̥jyate své dámūnāḥ  kavipraśastó átithiḥ śivó naḥ  sahásraśr̥ṅgo vr̥ṣabhás tádojāḥ-  víśvām̐ agne sáhasā prā́sy anyā́n

translation.text: He, worshipful House-Friend, in his home is worshipped, our own auspicious guest, lauded by sages. That strength the Bull with thousand horns possesses. In might, O Agni, thou excellest others.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र स॒द्यो अ॑ग्ने॒ अत्ये॑ष्य॒न्याना॒विर्यस्मै॒ चारु॑तमो ब॒भूथ॑ ई॒ळेन्यो॑ वपु॒ष्यो॑ वि॒भावा॑ प्रि॒यो वि॒शामति॑थि॒र्मानु॑षीणाम्
verses.transliteration: prá sadyó agne áty eṣy anyā́n  āvír yásmai cā́rutamo babhū́tha  īḷényo vapuṣyò vibhā́vā  priyó viśā́m átithir mā́nuṣīṇām

translation.text: Thou quickly passest by all others, Agni, for him to whom thou hast appeared most lovely, Wondrously fair, adorable, effulgent, the guest of men, the darling of the people.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तुभ्यं॑ भरन्ति क्षि॒तयो॑ यविष्ठ ब॒लिम॑ग्ने॒ अन्ति॑त॒ ओत दू॒रात् आ भन्दि॑ष्ठस्य सुम॒तिं चि॑किद्धि बृ॒हत्ते॑ अग्ने॒ महि॒ शर्म॑ भ॒द्रम्
verses.transliteration: túbhyam bharanti kṣitáyo yaviṣṭha  balím agne ántita ótá dūrā́t  ā́ bhándiṣṭhasya sumatíṃ cikiddhi  br̥hát te agne máhi śárma bhadrám

translation.text: To thee, Most Youthful God! to thee, O Agni from near and far the people bring their tribute. Mark well the prayer of him who best extols thee. Great, high, auspicious, Agni, is thy shelter.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आद्य रथं॑ भानुमो भानु॒मन्त॒मग्ने॒ तिष्ठ॑ यज॒तेभिः॒ सम॑न्तम् वि॒द्वान्प॑थी॒नामु॒र्व१॒॑न्तरि॑क्ष॒मेह दे॒वान्ह॑वि॒रद्या॑य वक्षि
verses.transliteration: ā́dyá rátham bhānumo bhānumántam  ágne tíṣṭha yajatébhiḥ sámantam  vidvā́n pathīnā́m urv àntárikṣam  éhá devā́n havirádyāya vakṣi

translation.text: Ascend to-day thy splendid car, O Agni, in splendour, with the Holy Ones around it. Knowing the paths by mid-air's spacious region bring hither Gods to feast on our oblation.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अवो॑चाम क॒वये॒ मेध्या॑य॒ वचो॑ व॒न्दारु॑ वृष॒भाय॒ वृष्णे॑ गवि॑ष्ठिरो॒ नम॑सा॒ स्तोम॑म॒ग्नौ दि॒वी॑व रु॒क्ममु॑रु॒व्यञ्च॑मश्रेत्
verses.transliteration: ávocāma kaváye médhyāya  váco vandā́ru vr̥ṣabhā́ya vŕ̥ṣṇe  gáviṣṭhiro námasā stómam agnaú  divī̀va rukmám uruvyáñcam aśret

translation.text: To him adorable, sage, strong and mighty we have sung forth our song of praise and homage. Gavishṭhira hath raised with prayer to Agni this laud far-reaching, like gold light to heaven.

verses.sanskrit_deva: कु॒मा॒रं मा॒ता यु॑व॒तिः समु॑ब्धं॒ गुहा॑ बिभर्ति॒ न द॑दाति पि॒त्रे अनी॑कमस्य॒ न मि॒नज्जना॑सः पु॒रः प॑श्यन्ति॒ निहि॑तमर॒तौ
verses.transliteration: kumārám mātā́ yuvatíḥ sámubdhaṃ  gúhā bibharti ná dadāti pitré  ánīkam asya ná mináj jánāsaḥ  puráḥ paśyanti níhitam arataú

translation.text: THE youthful Mother keeps the Boy in secret pressed to her close, nor yields him to the Father. But, when he lies upon the arm, the people see his unfading countenance before them.

verses.sanskrit_deva: कमे॒तं त्वं यु॑वते कुमा॒रं पेषी॑ बिभर्षि॒ महि॑षी जजान पू॒र्वीर्हि गर्भः॑ श॒रदो॑ व॒वर्धाप॑श्यं जा॒तं यदसू॑त मा॒ता
verses.transliteration: kám etáṃ tváṃ yuvate kumārám  péṣī bibharṣi máhiṣī jajāna  pūrvī́r hí gárbhaḥ śarádo vavárdha-  -ápaśyaṃ jātáṃ yád ásūta mātā́

translation.text: What child is this thou carriest as handmaid, O Youthful One? The Consort-Queen hath bome him. The Babe unborn increased through many autumns. I saw him born what time his Mother bare him.

verses.sanskrit_deva: हिर॑ण्यदन्तं॒ शुचि॑वर्णमा॒रात्क्षेत्रा॑दपश्य॒मायु॑धा॒ मिमा॑नम् द॒दा॒नो अ॑स्मा अ॒मृतं॑ वि॒पृक्व॒त्किं माम॑नि॒न्द्राः कृ॑णवन्ननु॒क्थाः
verses.transliteration: híraṇyadantaṃ śúcivarṇam ārā́t  kṣétrād apaśyam ā́yudhā mímānam  dadānó asmā amŕ̥taṃ vipŕ̥kvat  kím mā́m anindrā́ḥ kr̥ṇavann anukthā́ḥ

translation.text: I saw him from afar gold-toothed, bright-coloured, hurling his weapons from his habitation, What time I gave him Amrit free from mixture. How can the Indraless, the hymnless harm me?

verses.sanskrit_deva: क्षेत्रा॑दपश्यं सनु॒तश्चर॑न्तं सु॒मद्यू॒थं न पु॒रु शोभ॑मानम् न ता अ॑गृभ्र॒न्नज॑निष्ट॒ हि षः पलि॑क्नी॒रिद्यु॑व॒तयो॑ भवन्ति
verses.transliteration: kṣétrād apaśyaṃ sanutáś cárantaṃ  sumád yūtháṃ ná purú śóbhamānam  ná tā́ agr̥bhrann ájaniṣṭa hí ṣáḥ  páliknīr íd yuvatáyo bhavanti

translation.text: I saw him moving from the place he dwells in, even as with a herd, brilliantly shining. These seized him not: he had been born already. They who were grey with age again grow youthful.

verses.sanskrit_deva: के मे॑ मर्य॒कं वि य॑वन्त॒ गोभि॒र्न येषां॑ गो॒पा अर॑णश्चि॒दास॑ य ईं॑ जगृ॒भुरव॒ ते सृ॑ज॒न्त्वाजा॑ति प॒श्व उप॑ नश्चिकि॒त्वान्
verses.transliteration: ké me maryakáṃ ví yavanta góbhir  ná yéṣāṃ gopā́ áraṇaś cid ā́sa  yá īṃ jagr̥bhúr áva té sr̥jantu-  ā́jāti paśvá úpa naś cikitvā́n

translation.text: Who separate my young bull from the cattle, they whose protector was in truth no stranger? Let those whose hands have seized upon them free them. May he, observant, drive the herd to usward.

verses.sanskrit_deva: व॒सां राजा॑नं वस॒तिं जना॑ना॒मरा॑तयो॒ नि द॑धु॒र्मर्त्ये॑षु ब्रह्मा॒ण्यत्रे॒रव॒ तं सृ॑जन्तु निन्दि॒तारो॒ निन्द्या॑सो भवन्तु
verses.transliteration: vasā́ṃ rā́jānaṃ vasatíṃ jánānām  árātayo ní dadhur mártyeṣu  bráhmāṇy átrer áva táṃ sr̥jantu  ninditā́ro níndyāso bhavantu

translation.text: Mid mortal men godless have secreted the King of all who live, home of the people. So may the prayers of Atri give him freedom. Reproached in turn be those who now reproach him.

verses.sanskrit_deva: शुन॑श्चि॒च्छेपं॒ निदि॑तं स॒हस्रा॒द्यूपा॑दमुञ्चो॒ अश॑मिष्ट॒ हि षः ए॒वास्मद॑ग्ने॒ वि मु॑मुग्धि॒ पाशा॒न्होत॑श्चिकित्व इ॒ह तू नि॒षद्य॑
verses.transliteration: śúnaś cic chépaṃ níditaṃ sahásrād  yū́pād amuñco áśamiṣṭa hí ṣáḥ  evā́smád agne ví mumugdhi pā́śān  hótaś cikitva ihá tū́ niṣádya

translation.text: Thou from the stake didst loose e'en Ṣunaḥṣepa bound for a thousand; for he prayed with fervour. So, Agni, loose from us the bonds that bind us, when thou art seated here, O Priest who knowest.

verses.sanskrit_deva: हृ॒णी॒यमा॑नो॒ अप॒ हि मदैयेः॒ प्र मे॑ दे॒वानां॑ व्रत॒पा उ॑वाच इन्द्रो॑ वि॒द्वाँ अनु॒ हि त्वा॑ च॒चक्ष॒ तेना॒हम॑ग्ने॒ अनु॑शिष्ट॒ आगा॑म्
verses.transliteration: hr̥ṇīyámāno ápa hí mád aíyeḥ  prá me devā́nāṃ vratapā́ uvāca  índro vidvā́m̐ ánu hí tvā cacákṣa  ténāhám agne ánuśiṣṭa ā́gām

translation.text: Thou hast sped from me, Agni, in thine anger: this the protector of Gods' Laws hath told me. Indra who knoweth bent his eye upon thee: by him instructed am I come, O Agni.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वि ज्योति॑षा बृह॒ता भा॑त्य॒ग्निरा॒विर्विश्वा॑नि कृणुते महि॒त्वा प्रादे॑वीर्मा॒याः स॑हते दु॒रेवाः॒ शिशी॑ते॒ शृङ्गे॒ रक्ष॑से वि॒निक्षे॑
verses.transliteration: ví jyótiṣā br̥hatā́ bhāty agnír  āvír víśvāni kr̥ṇute mahitvā́  prā́devīr māyā́ḥ sahate durévāḥ  śíśīte śŕ̥ṅge rákṣase viníkṣe

translation.text: Agni shines far and wide with lofty splendour, and by his greatness makes all things apparent. He conquers godless and malign enchantments, and sharpens both his horns to gore the Raksas.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒त स्वा॒नासो॑ दि॒वि ष॑न्त्व॒ग्नेस्ति॒ग्मायु॑धा॒ रक्ष॑से॒ हन्त॒वा उ॑ मदे॑ चिदस्य॒ प्र रु॑जन्ति॒ भामा॒ न व॑रन्ते परि॒बाधो॒ अदे॑वीः
verses.transliteration: utá svānā́so diví ṣantv agnés  tigmā́yudhā rákṣase hántavā́ u  máde cid asya prá rujanti bhā́māḥ-  ná varante paribā́dho ádevīḥ

translation.text: Loud in the heaven above be Agni's roarings with keen-edged weapons to destroy the demons. Forth burst his splendours in the Soma's rapture. The godless bands press round but cannot stayhim.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒तं ते॒ स्तोमं॑ तुविजात॒ विप्रो॒ रथं॒ न धीरः॒ स्वपा॑ अतक्षम् यदीद॑ग्ने॒ प्रति॒ त्वं दे॑व॒ हर्याः॒ स्व॑र्वतीर॒प ए॑ना जयेम
verses.transliteration: etáṃ te stómaṃ tuvijāta vípro  ráthaṃ ná dhī́raḥ svápā atakṣam  yádī́d agne práti tváṃ deva háryāḥ  svàrvatīr apá enā jayema

translation.text: As a skilled craftsman makes a car, a singer I, Mighty One! this hymn for thee have fashioned. If thou, O Agni, God, accept it gladly, may we obtain thereby the heavenly Waters.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तु॒वि॒ग्रीवो॑ वृष॒भो वा॑वृधा॒नो॑ऽश॒त्र्व१॒॑र्यः सम॑जाति॒ वेदः॑ इती॒मम॒ग्निम॒मृता॑ अवोचन्ब॒र्हिष्म॑ते॒ मन॑वे॒ शर्म॑ यंसद्ध॒विष्म॑ते॒ मन॑वे॒ शर्म॑ यंसत्
verses.transliteration: tuvigrī́vo vr̥ṣabhó vāvr̥dhānáḥ-  -aśatrv àryáḥ sám ajāti védaḥ  ítīmám agním amŕ̥tā avocan  barhíṣmate mánave śárma yaṃsad  -havíṣmate mánave śárma yaṃsat

translation.text: May he, the strong-necked Steer, waxing in vigour, gather the foeman's wealth with none to check him. Thus to this Agni have the Immortals spoken. To man who spreads the grass may he grant shelter, grant shelter to the man who brings oblation.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वम॑ग्ने॒ वरु॑णो॒ जाय॑से॒ यत्त्वं मि॒त्रो भ॑वसि॒ यत्समि॑द्धः त्वे विश्वे॑ सहसस्पुत्र दे॒वास्त्वमिन्द्रो॑ दा॒शुषे॒ मर्त्या॑य
verses.transliteration: tvám agne váruṇo jā́yase yát  tvám mitró bhavasi yát sámiddhaḥ  tvé víśve sahasas putra devā́s  tvám índro dāśúṣe mártyāya

translation.text: THOU at thy birth art Varuṇa, O Agni; when thou art kindled thou becomest Mitra. In thee, O Son of Strength, all Gods are centred. Indra art thou to man who brings oblation.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वम॑र्य॒मा भ॑वसि॒ यत्क॒नीनां॒ नाम॑ स्वधाव॒न्गुह्यं॑ बिभर्षि अ॒ञ्जन्ति॑ मि॒त्रं सुधि॑तं॒ न गोभि॒र्यद्दम्प॑ती॒ सम॑नसा कृ॒णोषि॑
verses.transliteration: tvám aryamā́ bhavasi yát kanī́nāṃ  nā́ma svadhāvan gúhyam bibharṣi  añjánti mitráṃ súdhitaṃ ná góbhir  yád dámpatī sámanasā kr̥ṇóṣi

translation.text: Aryaman art thou as regardeth maidens mysterious, is thy name, O Self-sustainer. As a kind friend with streams of milk they balm thee what time thou makcst wife and lord oneminded.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तव॑ श्रि॒ये म॒रुतो॑ मर्जयन्त॒ रुद्र॒ यत्ते॒ जनि॑म॒ चारु॑ चि॒त्रम् प॒दं यद्विष्णो॑रुप॒मं नि॒धायि॒ तेन॑ पासि॒ गुह्यं॒ नाम॒ गोना॑म्
verses.transliteration: táva śriyé marúto marjayanta  rúdra yát te jánima cā́ru citrám  padáṃ yád víṣṇor upamáṃ nidhā́yi  téna pāsi gúhyaṃ nā́ma gónām

translation.text: The Maruts deck their beauty for thy glory, yea, Rudra! for thy birth fair, brightly-coloured. That which was fixed as Vishṇu's loftiest station-therewith the secret of the Cows thou guardest.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तव॑ श्रि॒या सु॒दृशो॑ देव दे॒वाः पु॒रू दधा॑ना अ॒मृतं॑ सपन्त होता॑रम॒ग्निं मनु॑षो॒ नि षे॑दुर्दश॒स्यन्त॑ उ॒शिजः॒ शंस॑मा॒योः
verses.transliteration: táva śriyā́ sudŕ̥śo deva devā́ḥ  purū́ dádhānā amŕ̥taṃ sapanta  hótāram agním mánuṣo ní ṣedur  daśasyánta uśíjaḥ śáṃsam āyóḥ

translation.text: Gods through thy glory, God who art so lovely! granting abundant gifts gained life immortal. As their own Priest have men established Agni; and serve him fain for praise from him who liveth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: न त्वद्धोता॒ पूर्वो॑ अग्ने॒ यजी॑या॒न्न काव्यैः॑ प॒रो अ॑स्ति स्वधावः वि॒शश्च॒ यस्या॒ अति॑थि॒र्भवा॑सि॒ स य॒ज्ञेन॑ वनवद्देव॒ मर्ता॑न्
verses.transliteration: ná tvád dhótā pū́rvo agne yájīyān  ná kā́vyaiḥ paró asti svadhāvaḥ  viśáś ca yásyā átithir bhávāsi  sá yajñéna vanavad deva mártān

translation.text: There is no priest more skilled than thou in worship; none Self-sustainer pass thee in wisdom. Ile man within whose house as guest thou dwellest, O God, by sacrifice shall conquer mortals.

verses.sanskrit_deva: व॒यम॑ग्ने वनुयाम॒ त्वोता॑ वसू॒यवो॑ ह॒विषा॒ बुध्य॑मानाः व॒यं स॑म॒र्ये वि॒दथे॒ष्वह्नां॑ व॒यं रा॒या स॑हसस्पुत्र॒ मर्ता॑न्
verses.transliteration: vayám agne vanuyāma tvótāḥ-  vasūyávo havíṣā búdhyamānāḥ  vayáṃ samaryé vidátheṣv áhnāṃ  vayáṃ rāyā́ sahasas putra mártān

translation.text: Aided by thee, O Agni may we conquer through our oblation, fain for wealth, awakened: May we in battle, in the days' assemblies,O Son of Strength, by riches conquer mortals.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यो न॒ आगो॑ अ॒भ्येनो॒ भरा॒त्यधीद॒घम॒घशं॑से दधात ज॒ही चि॑कित्वो अ॒भिश॑स्तिमे॒तामग्ने॒ यो नो॑ म॒र्चय॑ति द्व॒येन॑
verses.transliteration: yó na ā́go abhy éno bhárāti-  ádhī́d aghám agháśaṃse dadhāta  jahī́ cikitvo abhíśastim etā́m  ágne yó no marcáyati dvayéna

translation.text: He shall bring evil on the evil-plottcr whoever turns against us sin and outrage. Destroy this calumny of him, O Agni, whoever injures us with double-dealing.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वाम॒स्या व्युषि॑ देव॒ पूर्वे॑ दू॒तं कृ॑ण्वा॒ना अ॑यजन्त ह॒व्यैः सं॒स्थे यद॑ग्न॒ ईय॑से रयी॒णां दे॒वो मर्तै॒र्वसु॑भिरि॒ध्यमा॑नः
verses.transliteration: tvā́m asyā́ vyúṣi deva pū́rve  dūtáṃ kr̥ṇvānā́ ayajanta havyaíḥ  saṃsthé yád agna ī́yase rayīṇā́ṃ  devó mártair vásubhir idhyámānaḥ

translation.text: At this dawn's flushing, God! our ancient fathers served thee with offerings, making thee their envoy, When, Agni, to the store of wealth thou goest, a God cnkindled with good things by mortals.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अव॑ स्पृधि पि॒तरं॒ योधि॑ वि॒द्वान्पु॒त्रो यस्ते॑ सहसः सून ऊ॒हे क॒दा चि॑कित्वो अ॒भि च॑क्षसे॒ नोऽग्ने॑ क॒दाँ ऋ॑त॒चिद्या॑तयासे
verses.transliteration: áva spr̥dhi pitáraṃ yódhi vidvā́n  putró yás te sahasaḥ sūna ūhé  kadā́ cikitvo abhí cakṣase naḥ-  -ágne kadā́m̐ r̥tacíd yātayāse

translation.text: Save, thou who knowest, draw thy father near thee, who counts as thine own son, O Child of Power. O sapient Agni, when wilt thou regard us? When, skilled in holy Law, wilt thou direct us?

verses.sanskrit_deva: भूरि॒ नाम॒ वन्द॑मानो दधाति पि॒ता व॑सो॒ यदि॒ तज्जो॒षया॑से कु॒विद्दे॒वस्य॒ सह॑सा चका॒नः सु॒म्नम॒ग्निर्व॑नते वावृधा॒नः
verses.transliteration: bhū́ri nā́ma vándamāno dadhāti  pitā́ vaso yádi táj joṣáyāse  kuvíd devásya sáhasā cakānáḥ  sumnám agnír vanate vāvr̥dhānáḥ

translation.text: Adoring thee he gives thee many a title, when thou, Good Lord! acceptest this as Father. And doth not Agni, glad in strength of Godhead, gain splendid bliss when he hath waxen mighty?

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वम॒ङ्ग ज॑रि॒तारं॑ यविष्ठ॒ विश्वा॑न्यग्ने दुरि॒ताति॑ पर्षि स्ते॒ना अ॑दृश्रन्रि॒पवो॒ जना॒सोऽज्ञा॑तकेता वृजि॒ना अ॑भूवन्
verses.transliteration: tvám aṅgá jaritā́raṃ yaviṣṭha  víśvāny agne duritā́ti parṣi  stenā́ adr̥śran ripávo jánāsaḥ-  -ájñātaketā vr̥jinā́ abhūvan

translation.text: Most Youthful Agni, verily thou bearest thy praiser safely over all his troubles. Thieves have been seen by us and open foemen: unknown have been the plottings of the wicked.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒मे यामा॑सस्त्व॒द्रिग॑भूव॒न्वस॑वे वा॒ तदिदागो॑ अवाचि नाहा॒यम॒ग्निर॒भिश॑स्तये नो॒ न रीष॑ते वावृधा॒नः परा॑ दात्
verses.transliteration: imé yā́māsas tvadríg abhūvan  vásave vā tád íd ā́go avāci  nā́hāyám agnír abhíśastaye no  ná rī́ṣate vāvr̥dhānáḥ párā dāt

translation.text: To thee these eulogies have been directed: or to the Vasu hath this sin been spoken. But this our Agni, flaming high, shall never yield us to calumny, to him who wrongs us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वाम॑ग्ने॒ वसु॑पतिं॒ वसू॑नाम॒भि प्र म॑न्दे अध्व॒रेषु॑ राजन् त्वया॒ वाजं॑ वाज॒यन्तो॑ जयेमा॒भि ष्या॑म पृत्सु॒तीर्मर्त्या॑नाम्
verses.transliteration: tvā́m agne vásupatiṃ vásūnām  abhí prá mande adhvaréṣu rājan  tváyā vā́jaṃ vājayánto jayema-  -abhí ṣyāma pr̥tsutī́r mártyānām

translation.text: O AGNI, King and Lord of wealth and treasures, in thee is my delight at sacrifices. Through thee may we obtain the strength we long for, and overcome the fierce attacks of mortals.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ह॒व्य॒वाळ॒ग्निर॒जरः॑ पि॒ता नो॑ वि॒भुर्वि॒भावा॑ सु॒दृशी॑को अ॒स्मे सु॒गा॒र्ह॒प॒त्याः समिषो॑ दिदीह्यस्म॒द्र्य१॒॑क्सं मि॑मीहि॒ श्रवां॑सि
verses.transliteration: havyavā́ḷ agnír ajáraḥ pitā́ no  vibhúr vibhā́vā sudŕ̥śīko asmé  sugārhapatyā́ḥ sám íṣo didīhi-  asmadryàk sám mimīhi śrávāṃsi

translation.text: Agni, Eternal Father, offering- bearer, fair to behold, far-reaching, far-refulgent, From well-kept household fire beam food to feed us, and measure out to us abundant glory.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वि॒शां क॒विं वि॒श्पतिं॒ मानु॑षीणां॒ शुचिं॑ पाव॒कं घृ॒तपृ॑ष्ठम॒ग्निम् नि होता॑रं विश्व॒विदं॑ दधिध्वे॒ स दे॒वेषु॑ वनते॒ वार्या॑णि
verses.transliteration: viśā́ṃ kavíṃ viśpátim mā́nuṣīṇāṃ  śúcim pāvakáṃ ghr̥tápr̥ṣṭham agním  ní hótāraṃ viśvavídaṃ dadhidhve  sá devéṣu vanate vā́ryāṇi

translation.text: The Sage of men, the Lord of human races, pure, purifying Agni, balmed with butter, Him the Omniscient as your Priest ye stablish: he wins among the Gods things worth the choosing.

verses.sanskrit_deva: जु॒षस्वा॑ग्न॒ इळ॑या स॒जोषा॒ यत॑मानो र॒श्मिभिः॒ सूर्य॑स्य जु॒षस्व॑ नः स॒मिधं॑ जातवेद॒ आ च॑ दे॒वान्ह॑वि॒रद्या॑य वक्षि
verses.transliteration: juṣásvāgna íḷayā sajóṣāḥ-  yátamāno raśmíbhiḥ sū́ryasya  juṣásva naḥ samídhaṃ jātavedaḥ-  ā́ ca devā́n havirádyāya vakṣi

translation.text: Agni, enjoy, of one accord with Iḷâ, striving in rivalry with beams of Sarya, Enjoy, O Jâtavedas, this our fuel, and bring the Gods to us to taste oblations.

verses.sanskrit_deva: जुष्टो॒ दमू॑ना॒ अति॑थिर्दुरो॒ण इ॒मं नो॑ य॒ज्ञमुप॑ याहि वि॒द्वान् विश्वा॑ अग्ने अभि॒युजो॑ वि॒हत्या॑ शत्रूय॒तामा भ॑रा॒ भोज॑नानि
verses.transliteration: júṣṭo dámūnā átithir duroṇé-  imáṃ no yajñám úpa yāhi vidvā́n  víśvā agne abhiyújo vihátyā  śatrūyatā́m ā́ bharā bhójanāni

translation.text: As dear House-Friend, guest welcome in the dwelling, to this our sacrifice come thou who knowest. And, Agni, having scattered all assailants, bring to us the possessions of our foemen.

verses.sanskrit_deva: व॒धेन॒ दस्युं॒ प्र हि चा॒तय॑स्व॒ वयः॑ कृण्वा॒नस्त॒न्वे॒३॒॑ स्वायै॑ पिप॑र्षि॒ यत्स॑हसस्पुत्र दे॒वान्त्सो अ॑ग्ने पाहि नृतम॒ वाजे॑ अ॒स्मान्
verses.transliteration: vadhéna dásyum prá hí cātáyasva  váyaḥ kr̥ṇvānás tanvè svā́yai  píparṣi yát sahasas putra devā́n  só agne pāhi nr̥tama vā́je asmā́n

translation.text: Drive thou away the Dasyu with thy weapon. As, gaining vital power for thine own body, O Son of Strength, the Gods thou satisfiest, so in fight save us, most heroic Agni.

verses.sanskrit_deva: व॒यं ते॑ अग्न उ॒क्थैर्वि॑धेम व॒यं ह॒व्यैः पा॑वक भद्रशोचे अ॒स्मे र॒यिं वि॒श्ववा॑रं॒ समि॑न्वा॒स्मे विश्वा॑नि॒ द्रवि॑णानि धेहि
verses.transliteration: vayáṃ te agna ukthaír vidhema  vayáṃ havyaíḥ pāvaka bhadraśoce  asmé rayíṃ viśvávāraṃ sám inva-  -asmé víśvāni dráviṇāni dhehi

translation.text: May we, O Agni, with our lauds adore thee, and with our gifts, fair-beaming Purifier! Send to us wealth containing all things precious: bestow upon us every sort of riches.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒स्माक॑मग्ने अध्व॒रं जु॑षस्व॒ सह॑सः सूनो त्रिषधस्थ ह॒व्यम् व॒यं दे॒वेषु॑ सु॒कृतः॑ स्याम॒ शर्म॑णा नस्त्रि॒वरू॑थेन पाहि
verses.transliteration: asmā́kam agne adhvaráṃ juṣasva  sáhasaḥ sūno triṣadhastha havyám  vayáṃ devéṣu sukŕ̥taḥ syāma  śármaṇā nas trivárūthena pāhi

translation.text: Son of Strength, Agni, dweller in three regions, accept our sacrifice and our oblation. Among the Gods may we be counted pious: protect us with a triply-guarding shelter.

verses.sanskrit_deva: विश्वा॑नि नो दु॒र्गहा॑ जातवेदः॒ सिन्धुं॒ न ना॒वा दु॑रि॒ताति॑ पर्षि अग्ने॑ अत्रि॒वन्नम॑सा गृणा॒नो॒३॒॑ऽस्माकं॑ बोध्यवि॒ता त॒नूना॑म्
verses.transliteration: víśvāni no durgáhā jātavedaḥ  síndhuṃ ná nāvā́ duritā́ti parṣi  ágne atriván námasā gr̥ṇānáḥ-  -asmā́kam bodhy avitā́ tanū́nām

translation.text: Over all woes and dangers, Jâtavedas, bear us as in a boat across a river. Praised with our homage even as Atri praised thee, O Agni, be the guardian of our bodies.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यस्त्वा॑ हृ॒दा की॒रिणा॒ मन्य॑मा॒नोऽम॑र्त्यं॒ मर्त्यो॒ जोह॑वीमि जात॑वेदो॒ यशो॑ अ॒स्मासु॑ धेहि प्र॒जाभि॑रग्ने अमृत॒त्वम॑श्याम्
verses.transliteration: yás tvā hr̥dā́ kīríṇā mányamānaḥ-  -ámartyam mártyo jóhavīmi  jā́tavedo yáśo asmā́su dhehi  prajā́bhir agne amr̥tatvám aśyām

translation.text: As I, remembering thee with grateful spirit, a mortal, call with might on thee Immortal, Vouchsafe us high renown, O Jâtavedas, and may I be immortal by my children.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यस्मै॒ त्वं सु॒कृते॑ जातवेद उ लो॒कम॑ग्ने कृ॒णवः॑ स्यो॒नम् अ॒श्विनं॒ स पु॒त्रिणं॑ वी॒रव॑न्तं॒ गोम॑न्तं र॒यिं न॑शते स्व॒स्ति
verses.transliteration: yásmai tváṃ sukŕ̥te jātavedaḥ-  ulokám agne kr̥ṇávaḥ syonám  aśvínaṃ sá putríṇaṃ vīrávantaṃ  gómantaṃ rayíṃ naśate svastí

translation.text: The pious man, O Jâtavedas Agni, to whom thou grantest ample room and pleasure, Gaineth abundant wealth with sons and horses, with heroes and with kine for his well-being.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सुस॑मिद्धाय शो॒चिषे॑ घृ॒तं ती॒व्रं जु॑होतन अ॒ग्नये॑ जा॒तवे॑दसे
verses.transliteration: súsamiddhāya śocíṣe  ghr̥táṃ tīvráṃ juhotana  agnáye jātávedase

translation.text: To Agni, Jâtavedas, to the flame, the well-enkindled God, Offer thick sacrificial oil.

verses.sanskrit_deva: नरा॒शंसः॑ सुषूदती॒मं य॒ज्ञमदा॑भ्यः क॒विर्हि मधु॑हस्त्यः
verses.transliteration: nárāśáṃsaḥ suṣūdati-  -imáṃ yajñám ádābhyaḥ  kavír hí mádhuhastyaḥ

translation.text: He, Narâṣansa, ne'er beguiled, inspiriteth this sacrifice: For sage is he, with sweets in hand.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ई॒ळि॒तो अ॑ग्न॒ आ व॒हेन्द्रं॑ चि॒त्रमि॒ह प्रि॒यम् सु॒खै रथे॑भिरू॒तये॑
verses.transliteration: īḷitó agna ā́ vaha-  -índraṃ citrám ihá priyám  sukhaí ráthebhir ūtáye

translation.text: Adored, O Agni, hither bring Indra the Wonderful, the Friend, On lightly-rolling car to aid.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ऊर्ण॑म्रदा॒ वि प्र॑थस्वा॒भ्य१॒॑र्का अ॑नूषत भवा॑ नः शुभ्र सा॒तये॑
verses.transliteration: ū́rṇamradā ví prathasva-  -abhy àrkā́ anūṣata  bhávā naḥ śubhra sātáye

translation.text: Spread thyself out, thou soft as wool The holy hymns have sung to thee. Bring gain to us, O beautiful!

verses.sanskrit_deva: देवी॑र्द्वारो॒ वि श्र॑यध्वं सुप्राय॒णा न॑ ऊ॒तये॑ प्रप्र॑ य॒ज्ञं पृ॑णीतन
verses.transliteration: dévīr dvāro ví śrayadhvaṃ  suprāyaṇā́ na ūtáye  prá-pra yajñám pr̥ṇītana

translation.text: Open yourselves, ye Doors Divine, easy of access for our aid: Fill, more and more, the sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सु॒प्रती॑के वयो॒वृधा॑ य॒ह्वी ऋ॒तस्य॑ मा॒तरा॑ दो॒षामु॒षास॑मीमहे
verses.transliteration: suprátīke vayovŕ̥dhā  yahvī́ r̥tásya mātárā  doṣā́m uṣā́sam īmahe

translation.text: Fair strengtheners of vital power, young Mothers of eternal Law, Morning and Night we supplicate.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वात॑स्य॒ पत्म॑न्नीळि॒ता दैव्या॒ होता॑रा॒ मनु॑षः इ॒मं नो॑ य॒ज्ञमा ग॑तम्
verses.transliteration: vā́tasya pátmann īḷitā́  daívyā hótārā mánuṣaḥ  imáṃ no yajñám ā́ gatam

translation.text: On the wind's flight come, glorified, ye two celestial Priests of man Come ye to this our sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इळा॒ सर॑स्वती म॒ही ति॒स्रो दे॒वीर्म॑यो॒भुवः॑ ब॒र्हिः सी॑दन्त्व॒स्रिधः॑
verses.transliteration: íḷā sárasvatī mahī́  tisró devī́r mayobhúvaḥ  barhíḥ sīdantv asrídhaḥ

translation.text: lḷâ, Sarasvatî, Mahî, three Goddesses who bring us weal, Be seated harmless on the grass.

verses.sanskrit_deva: शि॒वस्त्व॑ष्टरि॒हा ग॑हि वि॒भुः पोष॑ उ॒त त्मना॑ य॒ज्ञेय॑ज्ञे न॒ उद॑व
verses.transliteration: śivás tvaṣṭar ihā́ gahi  vibhúḥ póṣa utá tmánā  yajñé-yajñe na úd ava

translation.text: Rich in all plenty, Tvashṭar, come auspicious of thine own accord Help us in every sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यत्र॒ वेत्थ॑ वनस्पते दे॒वानां॒ गुह्या॒ नामा॑नि तत्र॑ ह॒व्यानि॑ गामय
verses.transliteration: yátra véttha vanaspate  devā́nāṃ gúhyā nā́māni  tátra havyā́ni gāmaya

translation.text: Vanaspati, wherever thou knowest the Gods' mysterious names, Send our oblations thitherward.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स्वाहा॒ग्नये॒ वरु॑णाय॒ स्वाहेन्द्रा॑य म॒रुद्भ्यः॑ स्वाहा॑ दे॒वेभ्यो॑ ह॒विः
verses.transliteration: svā́hāgnáye váruṇāya  svā́héndrāya marúdbhyaḥ  svā́hā devébhyo havíḥ

translation.text: To Agni and to Varuṇa, Indra, the Maruts, and the Gods, With Svâhâ be oblation brought.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निं तं म॑न्ये॒ यो वसु॒रस्तं॒ यं यन्ति॑ धे॒नवः॑ अस्त॒मर्व॑न्त आ॒शवोऽस्तं॒ नित्या॑सो वा॒जिन॒ इषं॑ स्तो॒तृभ्य॒ आ भ॑र
verses.transliteration: agníṃ tám manye yó vásur  ástaṃ yáṃ yánti dhenávaḥ  ástam árvanta āśávaḥ-  -ástaṃ nítyāso vājínaḥ-  íṣaṃ stotŕ̥bhya ā́ bhara

translation.text: I VALUE Agni that good Lord, the home to which the kine return: Whom fleet-foot coursers seek as home, and strong enduring steeds as home. Bring food to those who sing thy praise.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सो अ॒ग्निर्यो वसु॑र्गृ॒णे सं यमा॒यन्ति॑ धे॒नवः॑ समर्व॑न्तो रघु॒द्रुवः॒ सं सु॑जा॒तासः॑ सू॒रय॒ इषं॑ स्तो॒तृभ्य॒ आ भ॑र
verses.transliteration: só agnír yó vásur gr̥ṇé  sáṃ yám āyánti dhenávaḥ  sám árvanto raghudrúvaḥ  sáṃ sujātā́saḥ sūráyaḥ-  íṣaṃ stotŕ̥bhya ā́ bhara

translation.text: 'Tis Agni whom we laud as good, to whom the milch-kine come in herds, To whom the chargers swift of foot, to whom our well-born princes come. Bring food to those who sing thy praise.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निर्हि वा॒जिनं॑ वि॒शे ददा॑ति वि॒श्वच॑र्षणिः अ॒ग्नी रा॒ये स्वा॒भुवं॒ स प्री॒तो या॑ति॒ वार्य॒मिषं॑ स्तो॒तृभ्य॒ आ भ॑र
verses.transliteration: agnír hí vājínaṃ viśé  dádāti viśvácarṣaṇiḥ  agnī́ rāyé svābhúvaṃ  sá prītó yāti vā́ryam  íṣaṃ stotŕ̥bhya ā́ bhara

translation.text: Agni the God of all mankind, gives, verily, a steed to man. Agni gives precious gear for wealth, treasure he gives when he is pleased. Bring food to those who sing thy praise.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ ते॑ अग्न इधीमहि द्यु॒मन्तं॑ देवा॒जर॑म् यद्ध॒ स्या ते॒ पनी॑यसी स॒मिद्दी॒दय॑ति॒ द्यवीषं॑ स्तो॒तृभ्य॒ आ भ॑र
verses.transliteration: ā́ te agna idhīmahi  dyumántaṃ devājáram  yád dha syā́ te pánīyasī  samíd dīdáyati dyávi-  íṣaṃ stotŕ̥bhya ā́ bhara

translation.text: God, Agni, we will kindle thee, rich in thy splendour, fading not, So that this glorious fuel may send forth by day its light for thee. Bring food to those who sing thy praise.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ ते॑ अग्न ऋ॒चा ह॒विः शुक्र॑स्य शोचिषस्पते सुश्च॑न्द्र॒ दस्म॒ विश्प॑ते॒ हव्य॑वा॒ट् तुभ्यं॑ हूयत॒ इषं॑ स्तो॒तृभ्य॒ आ भ॑र
verses.transliteration: ā́ te agna r̥cā́ havíḥ  śúkrasya śociṣas pate  súścandra dásma víśpate  hávyavāṭ túbhyaṃ hūyate-  íṣaṃ stotŕ̥bhya ā́ bhara

translation.text: To thee the splendid, Lord of flame, bright, wondrous, Prince of men, is brought. Oblation with the holy verse, O Agni, bearer of our gifts. Bring food to those who sing thy praise.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्रो त्ये अ॒ग्नयो॒ऽग्निषु॒ विश्वं॑ पुष्यन्ति॒ वार्य॑म् ते हि॑न्विरे॒ त इ॑न्विरे॒ त इ॑षण्यन्त्यानु॒षगिषं॑ स्तो॒तृभ्य॒ आ भ॑र
verses.transliteration: pró tyé agnáyo 'gníṣu  víśvam puṣyanti vā́ryam  té hinvire tá invire  tá iṣaṇyanty ānuṣág  íṣaṃ stotŕ̥bhya ā́ bhara

translation.text: These Agnis in the seats of the fire nourish each thing most excellent. They give delight, they spread abroad, they move themselves continually. Bring food to those who sing thy praise.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तव॒ त्ये अ॑ग्ने अ॒र्चयो॒ महि॑ व्राधन्त वा॒जिनः॑ ये पत्व॑भिः श॒फानां॑ व्र॒जा भु॒रन्त॒ गोना॒मिषं॑ स्तो॒तृभ्य॒ आ भ॑र
verses.transliteration: táva tyé agne arcáyo  máhi vrādhanta vājínaḥ  yé pátvabhiḥ śaphā́nāṃ  vrajā́ bhuránta gónām  íṣaṃ stotŕ̥bhya ā́ bhara

translation.text: Agni, these brilliant flames of thine wax like strong chargers mightily, Who with the treadings of their hoofs go swiftly to the stalls of kine. Bring food to those who sing thy praise.

verses.sanskrit_deva: नवा॑ नो अग्न॒ आ भ॑र स्तो॒तृभ्यः॑ सुक्षि॒तीरिषः॑ ते स्या॑म॒ य आ॑नृ॒चुस्त्वादू॑तासो॒ दमे॑दम॒ इषं॑ स्तो॒तृभ्य॒ आ भ॑र
verses.transliteration: návā no agna ā́ bhara  stotŕ̥bhyaḥ sukṣitī́r íṣaḥ  té syāma yá ānr̥cús  tvā́dūtāso dáme-dame-  íṣaṃ stotŕ̥bhya ā́ bhara

translation.text: To us who laud thee, Agni, bring fresh food and safe and happy homes. May we who have sung hymns to thee have thee for envoy in each house. Bring food to those who sing thy praise.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒भे सु॑श्चन्द्र स॒र्पिषो॒ दर्वी॑ श्रीणीष आ॒सनि॑ उ॒तो न॒ उत्पु॑पूर्या उ॒क्थेषु॑ शवसस्पत॒ इषं॑ स्तो॒तृभ्य॒ आ भ॑र
verses.transliteration: ubhé suścandra sarpíṣo  dárvī śrīṇīṣa āsáni  utó na út pupūryāḥ-  ukthéṣu śavasas pate-  íṣaṃ stotŕ̥bhya ā́ bhara

translation.text: Thou, brilliant God, within thy mouth warmest both ladies of the oil. So fill us also, in our hymns, abundantly, O Lord of Strength,Bring food to those who sing thy praise.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒वाँ अ॒ग्निम॑जुर्यमुर्गी॒र्भिर्य॒ज्ञेभि॑रानु॒षक् दध॑द॒स्मे सु॒वीर्य॑मु॒त त्यदा॒श्वश्व्य॒मिषं॑ स्तो॒तृभ्य॒ आ भ॑र
verses.transliteration: evā́m̐ agním ajuryamur  gīrbhír yajñébhir ānuṣák  dádhad asmé suvī́ryam  utá tyád āśváśvyam  íṣaṃ stotŕ̥bhya ā́ bhara

translation.text: Thus Agni have we duly served with sacrifices and with hymns. So may he give us what we crave, store of brave sons and fleet-foot steeds. Bring food to those who sing thy praise.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सखा॑यः॒ सं वः॑ स॒म्यञ्च॒मिषं॒ स्तोमं॑ चा॒ग्नये॑ वर्षि॑ष्ठाय क्षिती॒नामू॒र्जो नप्त्रे॒ सह॑स्वते
verses.transliteration: sákhāyaḥ sáṃ vaḥ samyáñcam  íṣaṃ stómaṃ cāgnáye  várṣiṣṭhāya kṣitīnā́m  ūrjó náptre sáhasvate

translation.text: OFFER to Agni, O my friends, your seemly food, your seemly praise; To him supremest o'er the folk, the Son of Strength, the mighty Lord:

verses.sanskrit_deva: कुत्रा॑ चि॒द्यस्य॒ समृ॑तौ र॒ण्वा नरो॑ नृ॒षद॑ने अर्ह॑न्तश्चि॒द्यमि॑न्ध॒ते सं॑ज॒नय॑न्ति ज॒न्तवः॑
verses.transliteration: kútrā cid yásya sámr̥tau  raṇvā́ náro nr̥ṣádane  árhantaś cid yám indhaté  saṃjanáyanti jantávaḥ

translation.text: Him in whose presence, when they meet in full assembly, men rejoice; Even him whom worthy ones inflame, and living creatures bring to life.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सं यदि॒षो वना॑महे॒ सं ह॒व्या मानु॑षाणाम् उ॒त द्यु॒म्नस्य॒ शव॑स ऋ॒तस्य॑ र॒श्मिमा द॑दे
verses.transliteration: sáṃ yád iṣó vánāmahe  sáṃ havyā́ mā́nuṣāṇām  utá dyumnásya śávasā-  r̥tásya raśmím ā́ dade

translation.text: When we present to him the food and sacrificial gifts of men, He by the might of splendour grasps the holy Ordinance's rein.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स स्मा॑ कृणोति के॒तुमा नक्तं॑ चिद्दू॒र आ स॒ते पा॒व॒को यद्वन॒स्पती॒न्प्र स्मा॑ मि॒नात्य॒जरः॑
verses.transliteration: sá smā kr̥ṇoti ketúm~ā́  náktaṃ cid dūrá ā́ saté  pāvakó yád vánaspátīn  prá smā minā́ty ajáraḥ

translation.text: He gives a signal in the night even to him who is afar, When he, the Bright, unchanged by eld, consumes the sovrans of the wood.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अव॑ स्म॒ यस्य॒ वेष॑णे॒ स्वेदं॑ प॒थिषु॒ जुह्व॑ति अ॒भीमह॒ स्वजे॑न्यं॒ भूमा॑ पृ॒ष्ठेव॑ रुरुहुः
verses.transliteration: áva sma yásya véṣaṇe  svédam pathíṣu júhvati  abhī́m áha svájenyam  bhū́mā pr̥ṣṭhéva ruruhuḥ

translation.text: He in whose service on the ways they offer up their drops of sweat, On him is their high kin have they mounted, as ridges on the earth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यं मर्त्यः॑ पुरु॒स्पृहं॑ वि॒दद्विश्व॑स्य॒ धाय॑से प्र स्वाद॑नं पितू॒नामस्त॑तातिं चिदा॒यवे॑
verses.transliteration: yám mártyaḥ puruspŕ̥haṃ  vidád víśvasya dhā́yase  prá svā́danam pitūnā́m  ástatātiṃ cid āyáve

translation.text: Whom, sought of many, mortal man hath found to be the Stay of all; He who gives flavour to our food, the home of every man that lives.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स हि ष्मा॒ धन्वाक्षि॑तं॒ दाता॒ न दात्या प॒शुः हिरि॑श्मश्रुः॒ शुचि॑दन्नृ॒भुरनि॑भृष्टतविषिः
verses.transliteration: sá hí ṣmā dhánvā́kṣitaṃ  dā́tā ná dā́ty ā́ paśúḥ  híriśmaśruḥ śúcidann  r̥bhúr ánibhr̥ṣṭataviṣiḥ

translation.text: Even as a herd that crops the grass he shears the field and wilderness, With flashing teeth and beard of gold, deft with his unabated might.

verses.sanskrit_deva: शुचिः॑ ष्म॒ यस्मा॑ अत्रि॒वत्प्र स्वधि॑तीव॒ रीय॑ते सु॒षूर॑सूत मा॒ता क्रा॒णा यदा॑न॒शे भग॑म्
verses.transliteration: śúciḥ ṣma yásmā atrivát  prá svádhitīva rī́yate  suṣū́r asūta mātā́  krāṇā́ yád ānaśé bhágam

translation.text: For him, to whom, bright as an axe he, as to Atri, hath flashed forth, Hath the well-bearing Mother borne, producing when her time is come.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ यस्ते॑ सर्पिरासु॒तेऽग्ने॒ शमस्ति॒ धाय॑से ऐषु॑ द्यु॒म्नमु॒त श्रव॒ आ चि॒त्तं मर्त्ये॑षु धाः
verses.transliteration: ā́ yás te sarpirāsute-  -ágne śám ásti dhā́yase  aíṣu dyumnám utá śrávaḥ-  ā́ cittám mártyeṣu dhāḥ

translation.text: Agni to whom the oil is shed by him thou lovest to support, Bestow upon these mortals fame and splendour and intelligence.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इति॑ चिन्म॒न्युम॒ध्रिज॒स्त्वादा॑त॒मा प॒शुं द॑दे आद॑ग्ने॒ अपृ॑ण॒तोऽत्रिः॑ सासह्या॒द्दस्यू॑नि॒षः सा॑सह्या॒न्नॄन्
verses.transliteration: íti cin manyúm adhríjas  tvā́dātam ā́ paśúṃ dade  ā́d agne ápr̥ṇataḥ-  -átriḥ sāsahyād dásyūn  iṣáḥ sāsahyān nr̥̄́n

translation.text: Such zeal hath he, resistless one: he gained the cattle given by thee. Agni, may Atri overcome the Dasyus who bestow no gifts, subdue the men who give no food.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वाम॑ग्न ऋता॒यवः॒ समी॑धिरे प्र॒त्नं प्र॒त्नास॑ ऊ॒तये॑ सहस्कृत पु॒रु॒श्च॒न्द्रं य॑ज॒तं वि॒श्वधा॑यसं॒ दमू॑नसं गृ॒हप॑तिं॒ वरे॑ण्यम्
verses.transliteration: tvā́m agna r̥tāyávaḥ sám īdhire  pratnám pratnā́sa ūtáye sahaskr̥ta  puruścandráṃ yajatáṃ viśvádhāyasaṃ  dámūnasaṃ gr̥hápatiṃ váreṇyam

translation.text: O AGNI urged to strength, the men of old who loved the Law enkindled thee, the Ancient, for their aid, Thee very bright, and holy, nourisher of all, most excellent, the Friend and Master of the home.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वाम॑ग्ने॒ अति॑थिं पू॒र्व्यं विशः॑ शो॒चिष्के॑शं गृ॒हप॑तिं॒ नि षे॑दिरे बृ॒हत्के॑तुं पुरु॒रूपं॑ धन॒स्पृतं॑ सु॒शर्मा॑णं॒ स्वव॑सं जर॒द्विष॑म्
verses.transliteration: tvā́m agne átithim pūrvyáṃ víśaḥ  śocíṣkeśaṃ gr̥hápatiṃ ní ṣedire  br̥hátketum pururū́paṃ dhanaspŕ̥taṃ  suśármāṇaṃ svávasaṃ jaradvíṣam

translation.text: Thee, Agni, men have stablished as their guest of old, as Master of the household, thee, with hair of flame; High-bannered, multiform, distributor of wealth, kind helper, good protector, drier of the floods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वाम॑ग्ने॒ मानु॑षीरीळते॒ विशो॑ होत्रा॒विदं॒ विवि॑चिं रत्न॒धात॑मम् गुहा॒ सन्तं॑ सुभग वि॒श्वद॑र्शतं तुविष्व॒णसं॑ सु॒यजं॑ घृत॒श्रिय॑म्
verses.transliteration: tvā́m agne mā́nuṣīr īḷate víśo  hotrāvídaṃ víviciṃ ratnadhā́tamam  gúhā sántaṃ subhaga viśvádarśataṃ  tuviṣvaṇásaṃ suyájaṃ ghr̥taśríyam

translation.text: The tribes of men praise thee, Agni, who knowest well burnt offerings, the Discerner, lavishest of wealth, Dwelling in secret, Blest One! visible to all, loud-roaring, skilled in worship, glorified with oil.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वाम॑ग्ने धर्ण॒सिं वि॒श्वधा॑ व॒यं गी॒र्भिर्गृ॒णन्तो॒ नम॒सोप॑ सेदिम स नो॑ जुषस्व समिधा॒नो अ॑ङ्गिरो दे॒वो मर्त॑स्य य॒शसा॑ सुदी॒तिभिः॑
verses.transliteration: tvā́m agne dharṇasíṃ viśvádhā vayáṃ  gīrbhír gr̥ṇánto námasópa sedima  sá no juṣasva samidhānó aṅgiro  devó mártasya yaśásā sudītíbhiḥ

translation.text: Ever to thee, O Agni, as exceeding strong have we drawn nigh with songs and reverence singing hymns. So be thou pleased with us, Angiras! as a God enkindled by the noble with man's goodly light.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वम॑ग्ने पुरु॒रूपो॑ वि॒शेवि॑शे॒ वयो॑ दधासि प्र॒त्नथा॑ पुरुष्टुत पु॒रूण्यन्ना॒ सह॑सा॒ वि रा॑जसि॒ त्विषिः॒ सा ते॑ तित्विषा॒णस्य॒ नाधृषे॑
verses.transliteration: tvám agne pururū́po viśé-viśe  váyo dadhāsi pratnáthā puruṣṭuta  purū́ṇy ánnā sáhasā ví rājasi  tvíṣiḥ sā́ te titviṣāṇásya nā́dhŕ̥ṣe

translation.text: Thou, Agni! multiform, God who art lauded much! givest in every house subsistence as of old. Thou rulest by thy might o'er food of many a sort: that light of thine when blazing may not be opposed.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वाम॑ग्ने समिधा॒नं य॑विष्ठ्य दे॒वा दू॒तं च॑क्रिरे हव्य॒वाह॑नम् उ॒रु॒ज्रय॑सं घृ॒तयो॑नि॒माहु॑तं त्वे॒षं चक्षु॑र्दधिरे चोद॒यन्म॑ति
verses.transliteration: tvā́m agne samidhānáṃ yaviṣṭhya  devā́ dūtáṃ cakrire havyavā́hanam  urujráyasaṃ ghr̥táyonim ā́hutaṃ  tveṣáṃ cákṣur dadhire codayánmati

translation.text: The Gods, Most Youthful Agni, have made thee, inflamed, the bearer of oblations and the messenger. Thee, widely-reaching, homed in sacred oil, invoked, effulgent, have they made the Eye that stirs the thought.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वाम॑ग्ने प्र॒दिव॒ आहु॑तं घृ॒तैः सु॑म्ना॒यवः॑ सुष॒मिधा॒ समी॑धिरे स वा॑वृधा॒न ओष॑धीभिरुक्षि॒तो॒३॒॑ऽभि ज्रयां॑सि॒ पार्थि॑वा॒ वि ति॑ष्ठसे
verses.transliteration: tvā́m agne pradíva ā́hutaṃ ghr̥taíḥ  sumnāyávaḥ suṣamídhā sám īdhire  sá vāvr̥dhāná óṣadhībhir ukṣitáḥ-  -abhí jráyāṃsi pā́rthivā ví tiṣṭhase

translation.text: Men seeking joy have lit thee worshipped from of old, O Agni, with good fuel and with sacred oil. So thou, bedewed and waxing mighty by the plants, spreadest thyself abroad over the realms of earth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वाम॑ग्ने ह॒विष्म॑न्तो दे॒वं मर्ता॑स ईळते मन्ये॑ त्वा जा॒तवे॑दसं॒ स ह॒व्या व॑क्ष्यानु॒षक्
verses.transliteration: tvā́m agne havíṣmanto  devám mártāsa īḷate  mánye tvā jātávedasaṃ  sá havyā́ vakṣy ānuṣák

translation.text: BEARING; oblations mortal men, O Agni, worship thee the God. I deem thee Jâtavedas: bear our offerings, thou, unceasingly.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निर्होता॒ दास्व॑तः॒ क्षय॑स्य वृ॒क्तब॑र्हिषः सं य॒ज्ञास॒श्चर॑न्ति॒ यं सं वाजा॑सः श्रव॒स्यवः॑
verses.transliteration: agnír hótā dā́svataḥ  kṣáyasya vr̥ktábarhiṣaḥ  sáṃ yajñā́saś cáranti yáṃ  sáṃ vā́jāsaḥ śravasyávaḥ

translation.text: In the man's home who offers gifts, where grass is trimmed, Agni is Priest, To whom all sacrifices come and strengthenings that win renown.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒त स्म॒ यं शिशुं॑ यथा॒ नवं॒ जनि॑ष्टा॒रणी॑ ध॒र्तारं॒ मानु॑षीणां वि॒शाम॒ग्निं स्व॑ध्व॒रम्
verses.transliteration: utá sma yáṃ śíśuṃ yathā  návaṃ jániṣṭāráṇī  dhartā́ram mā́nuṣīṇāṃ  viśā́m agníṃ svadhvarám

translation.text: Whom, as an infant newly-born, the kindling-sticks have brought to life, Sustainer of the tribes of men, skilled in well-ordered sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒त स्म॑ दुर्गृभीयसे पु॒त्रो न ह्वा॒र्याणा॑म् पु॒रू यो दग्धासि॒ वनाग्ने॑ प॒शुर्न यव॑से
verses.transliteration: utá sma durgr̥bhīyase  putró ná hvāryā́ṇām  purū́ yó dágdhā́si vánā-  -ágne paśúr ná yávase

translation.text: Yea, very hard art thou to grasp, like offspring of the wriggling snakes, When thou consumest many woods like an ox, Agni, in the mead.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अध॑ स्म॒ यस्या॒र्चयः॑ स॒म्यक्सं॒यन्ति॑ धू॒मिनः॑ यदी॒मह॑ त्रि॒तो दि॒व्युप॒ ध्माते॑व॒ धम॑ति॒ शिशी॑ते ध्मा॒तरी॑ यथा
verses.transliteration: ádha sma yásyārcáyaḥ  samyák saṃyánti dhūmínaḥ  yád īm áha tritó diví-  úpa dhmā́teva dhámati  śíśīte dhmātárī yathā

translation.text: Whose flames, when thou art sending forth the smoke, completely reach the mark, When Trita in the height of heaven, like as a smelter fanneth thee, e'en as a smelter sharpeneth thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तवा॒हम॑ग्न ऊ॒तिभि॑र्मि॒त्रस्य॑ च॒ प्रश॑स्तिभिः द्वे॒षो॒युतो॒ न दु॑रि॒ता तु॒र्याम॒ मर्त्या॑नाम्
verses.transliteration: távāhám agna ūtíbhir  mitrásya ca práśastibhiḥ  dveṣoyúto ná duritā́  turyā́ma mártyānām

translation.text: O Agni, by thy succour and by Mitra's friendly furtherance, May we, averting hate, subbue the wickedness of mortal men.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तं नो॑ अग्ने अ॒भी नरो॑ र॒यिं स॑हस्व॒ आ भ॑र स क्षे॑पय॒त्स पो॑षय॒द्भुव॒द्वाज॑स्य सा॒तय॑ उ॒तैधि॑ पृ॒त्सु नो॑ वृ॒धे
verses.transliteration: táṃ no agne abhī́ náro  rayíṃ sahasva ā́ bhara  sá kṣepayat sá poṣayad  bhúvad vā́jasya sātáye-  utaídhi pr̥tsú no vr̥dhé

translation.text: O Agni, to our heroes bring such riches, thou victorious God. May he protect and nourish us, and help in aining strength: be thou near us in 6rht for our success.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अग्न॒ ओजि॑ष्ठ॒मा भ॑र द्यु॒म्नम॒स्मभ्य॑मध्रिगो प्र नो॑ रा॒या परी॑णसा॒ रत्सि॒ वाजा॑य॒ पन्था॑म्
verses.transliteration: ágna ójiṣṭham ā́ bhara  dyumnám asmábhyam adhrigo  prá no rāyā́ párīṇasā  rátsi vā́jāya pánthām

translation.text: BRING us most mighty splendour thou, Agni, resistless on thy way. With overflowing store of wealth mark out for us a path to strength.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं नो॑ अग्ने अद्भुत॒ क्रत्वा॒ दक्ष॑स्य मं॒हना॑ त्वे अ॑सु॒र्य१॒॑मारु॑हत्क्रा॒णा मि॒त्रो न य॒ज्ञियः॑
verses.transliteration: tváṃ no agne adbhuta  krátvā dákṣasya maṃhánā  tvé asuryàm ā́ruhat  krāṇā́ mitró ná yajñíyaḥ

translation.text: Ours art thou, wondrous Agni, bywisdom and bounteousness of power. The might of Asuras rests on thee, like Mitra worshipful in act.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं नो॑ अग्न एषां॒ गयं॑ पु॒ष्टिं च॑ वर्धय ये स्तोमे॑भिः॒ प्र सू॒रयो॒ नरो॑ म॒घान्या॑न॒शुः
verses.transliteration: tváṃ no agna eṣāṃ  gáyam puṣṭíṃ ca vardhaya  yé stómebhiḥ prá sūráyo  náro maghā́ny ānaśúḥ

translation.text: Agni, increase our means of life, increase the house and home of these, The men, the princes who have won great riches through our hymns of praise.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ये अ॑ग्ने चन्द्र ते॒ गिरः॑ शु॒म्भन्त्यश्व॑राधसः शुष्मे॑भिः शु॒ष्मिणो॒ नरो॑ दि॒वश्चि॒द्येषां॑ बृ॒हत्सु॑की॒र्तिर्बोध॑ति॒ त्मना॑
verses.transliteration: yé agne candra te gíraḥ  śumbhánty áśvarādhasaḥ  śúṣmebhiḥ śuṣmíṇo náro  diváś cid yéṣām br̥hát  sukīrtír bódhati tmánā

translation.text: Bright Agni, they who deck their songs for thee have horses as their meed. The men are mighty in their might, they whose high laud, as that of heaven, awakes thee of its own accord.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तव॒ त्ये अ॑ग्ने अ॒र्चयो॒ भ्राज॑न्तो यन्ति धृष्णु॒या परि॑ज्मानो॒ न वि॒द्युतः॑ स्वा॒नो रथो॒ न वा॑ज॒युः
verses.transliteration: táva tyé agne arcáyo  bhrā́janto yanti dhr̥ṣṇuyā́  párijmāno ná vidyútaḥ  svānó rátho ná vājayúḥ

translation.text: O Agni, those resplendent flames of thine go valorously forth, Like lightnings flashing round us, like a rattling car that seeks the spoil.

verses.sanskrit_deva: नू नो॑ अग्न ऊ॒तये॑ स॒बाध॑सश्च रा॒तये॑ अ॒स्माका॑सश्च सू॒रयो॒ विश्वा॒ आशा॑स्तरी॒षणि॑
verses.transliteration: nū́ no agna ūtáye  sabā́dhasaś ca rātáye  asmā́kāsaś ca sūráyo  víśvā ā́śās tarīṣáṇi

translation.text: Now, Agni, come to succour us; let priests draw nigh to offer gifts; And let the patrons of our rites subdue all regions of the earth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं नो॑ अग्ने अङ्गिरः स्तु॒तः स्तवा॑न॒ आ भ॑र होत॑र्विभ्वा॒सहं॑ र॒यिं स्तो॒तृभ्यः॒ स्तव॑से च न उ॒तैधि॑ पृ॒त्सु नो॑ वृ॒धे
verses.transliteration: tváṃ no agne aṅgiraḥ-  stutá stávāna ā́ bhara  hótar vibhvāsáhaṃ rayíṃ  stotŕ̥bhya stávase ca naḥ-  utaídhi pr̥tsú no vr̥dhé

translation.text: Bring to us, Agni, Angiras, lauded of old and lauded now, Invoker! wealth to quell the strong, that singers may extol thee. Be near us in fight for our success.

verses.sanskrit_deva: जन॑स्य गो॒पा अ॑जनिष्ट॒ जागृ॑विर॒ग्निः सु॒दक्षः॑ सुवि॒ताय॒ नव्य॑से घृ॒तप्र॑तीको बृह॒ता दि॑वि॒स्पृशा॑ द्यु॒मद्वि भा॑ति भर॒तेभ्यः॒ शुचिः॑
verses.transliteration: jánasya gopā́ ajaniṣṭa jā́gr̥vir  agníḥ sudákṣaḥ suvitā́ya návyase  ghr̥tápratīko br̥hatā́ divispŕ̥śā  dyumád ví bhāti bharatébhyaḥ śúciḥ

translation.text: THE watchful Guardian of the people hath been born, Agni, the very strong, for fresh prosperity. With oil upon his face, with high heaventouching flame, he shineth splendidly, pure, for the Bharatas.

verses.sanskrit_deva: य॒ज्ञस्य॑ के॒तुं प्र॑थ॒मं पु॒रोहि॑तम॒ग्निं नर॑स्त्रिषध॒स्थे समी॑धिरे इन्द्रे॑ण दे॒वैः स॒रथं॒ स ब॒र्हिषि॒ सीद॒न्नि होता॑ य॒जथा॑य सु॒क्रतुः॑
verses.transliteration: yajñásya ketúm prathamám puróhitam  agníṃ náras triṣadhasthé sám īdhire  índreṇa devaíḥ saráthaṃ sá barhíṣi  sī́dan ní hótā yajáthāya sukrátuḥ

translation.text: Ensign of sacrifice, the earliest Household-Priest, the. men have kindled Agni in his threefold seat, With Indra and the Gods together on the grass let the wise Priest sit to complete the sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अस॑म्मृष्टो जायसे मा॒त्रोः शुचि॑र्म॒न्द्रः क॒विरुद॑तिष्ठो वि॒वस्व॑तः घृ॒तेन॑ त्वावर्धयन्नग्न आहुत धू॒मस्ते॑ के॒तुर॑भवद्दि॒वि श्रि॒तः
verses.transliteration: ásammr̥ṣṭo jāyase mātróḥ śúcir  mandráḥ kavír úd atiṣṭho vivásvataḥ  ghr̥téna tvāvardhayann agna āhuta  dhūmás te ketúr abhavad diví śritáḥ

translation.text: Pure , unadorned, from thy two Mothers art thou born: thou camest fromVivasvan as a charming Sage. With oil they strengthened thee, O Agni, worshipped God: thy banner was the smoke that mounted to the sky.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निर्नो॑ य॒ज्ञमुप॑ वेतु साधु॒याग्निं नरो॒ वि भ॑रन्ते गृ॒हेगृ॑हे अ॒ग्निर्दू॒तो अ॑भवद्धव्य॒वाह॑नो॒ऽग्निं वृ॑णा॒ना वृ॑णते क॒विक्र॑तुम्
verses.transliteration: agnír no yajñám úpa vetu sādhuyā́-  -ágníṃ náro ví bharante gr̥hé-gr̥he  agnír dūtó abhavad dhavyavā́hano  -agníṃ vr̥ṇānā́ vr̥ṇate kavíkratum

translation.text: May Agni graciously come to our sacrifice. The men bear Agni here and there in every house. He hath become an envoy, bearer of our gifts: electing Agni, men choose one exceeding wise.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तुभ्ये॒दम॑ग्ने॒ मधु॑मत्तमं॒ वच॒स्तुभ्यं॑ मनी॒षा इ॒यम॑स्तु॒ शं हृ॒दे त्वां गिरः॒ सिन्धु॑मिवा॒वनी॑र्म॒हीरा पृ॑णन्ति॒ शव॑सा व॒र्धय॑न्ति च
verses.transliteration: túbhyedám agne mádhumattamaṃ vácas  túbhyam manīṣā́ iyám astu śáṃ hr̥dé  tvā́ṃ gíraḥ síndhum ivāvánīr mahī́r  ā́ pr̥ṇanti śávasā vardháyanti ca

translation.text: For thee, O Agni, is this sweetest prayer of mine: dear to thy spirit be this product of my thought. As great streams fill the river so our song of praise fill thee, and make thee yet more mighty in thy strength.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वाम॑ग्ने॒ अङ्गि॑रसो॒ गुहा॑ हि॒तमन्व॑विन्दञ्छिश्रिया॒णं वने॑वने स जा॑यसे म॒थ्यमा॑नः॒ सहो॑ म॒हत्त्वामा॑हुः॒ सह॑सस्पु॒त्रम॑ङ्गिरः
verses.transliteration: tvā́m agne áṅgiraso gúhā hitám  ánv avindañ chiśriyāṇáṃ váne-vane  sá jāyase mathyámānaḥ sáho mahát  tvā́m āhuḥ sáhasas putrám aṅgiraḥ

translation.text: O Agni, the Angirases discovered thee what time thou layest hidden, fleeing back from wood to wood. Thou by attrition art produced as conquer.ing might, and men, O Angiras, call thee the Son of Strength.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्राग्नये॑ बृह॒ते य॒ज्ञिया॑य ऋ॒तस्य॒ वृष्णे॒ असु॑राय॒ मन्म॑ घृ॒तं न य॒ज्ञ आ॒स्ये॒३॒॑ सुपू॑तं॒ गिरं॑ भरे वृष॒भाय॑ प्रती॒चीम्
verses.transliteration: prā́gnáye br̥haté yajñíyāya  r̥tásya vŕ̥ṣṇe ásurāya mánma  ghr̥táṃ ná yajñá āsyè súpūtaṃ  gíram bhare vr̥ṣabhā́ya pratīcī́m

translation.text: To Agni, lofty Asura, meet for worship, Steer of eternal Law, my prayer I offer; I bring my song directed to the Mighty like pure oil for his mouth at sacrifices.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ऋ॒तं चि॑कित्व ऋ॒तमिच्चि॑किद्ध्यृ॒तस्य॒ धारा॒ अनु॑ तृन्धि पू॒र्वीः नाहं या॒तुं सह॑सा॒ न द्व॒येन॑ ऋ॒तं स॑पाम्यरु॒षस्य॒ वृष्णः॑
verses.transliteration: r̥táṃ cikitva r̥tám íc cikiddhi-  r̥tásya dhā́rā ánu tr̥ndhi pūrvī́ḥ  nā́háṃ yātúṃ sáhasā ná dvayéna  r̥táṃ sapāmy aruṣásya vŕ̥ṣṇaḥ

translation.text: Mark the Law, thou who knowest, yea, observe it: send forth the full streams of eternal Order. I use no sorcery with might or falsehood the sacred Law of the Red Steer I follow.

verses.sanskrit_deva: कया॑ नो अग्न ऋ॒तय॑न्नृ॒तेन॒ भुवो॒ नवे॑दा उ॒चथ॑स्य॒ नव्यः॑ वेदा॑ मे दे॒व ऋ॑तु॒पा ऋ॑तू॒नां नाहं पतिं॑ सनि॒तुर॒स्य रा॒यः
verses.transliteration: káyā no agna r̥táyann r̥téna  bhúvo návedā ucáthasya návyaḥ  védā me devá r̥tupā́ r̥tūnā́ṃ  nā́hám pátiṃ sanitúr asyá rāyáḥ

translation.text: How hast thou, follower of the Law eternal, become the knower of a new song, Agni? The God, the Guardian of the seasons, knows me: the Lord of him who won this wealth I know not.

verses.sanskrit_deva: के ते॑ अग्ने रि॒पवे॒ बन्ध॑नासः॒ के पा॒यवः॑ सनिषन्त द्यु॒मन्तः॑ के धा॒सिम॑ग्ने॒ अनृ॑तस्य पान्ति॒ क आस॑तो॒ वच॑सः सन्ति गो॒पाः
verses.transliteration: ké te agne ripáve bándhanāsaḥ  ké pāyávaḥ saniṣanta dyumántaḥ  ké dhāsím agne ánr̥tasya pānti  ká ā́sato vácasaḥ santi gopā́ḥ

translation.text: Who, Agni, in alliance with thy foeman, what splendid helpers won for them their riches? Agni, who guard the dwelling-place of falsehood? Who are protectors of the speech of liars?

verses.sanskrit_deva: सखा॑यस्ते॒ विषु॑णा अग्न ए॒ते शि॒वासः॒ सन्तो॒ अशि॑वा अभूवन् अधू॑र्षत स्व॒यमे॒ते वचो॑भिर्ऋजूय॒ते वृ॑जि॒नानि॑ ब्रु॒वन्तः॑
verses.transliteration: sákhāyas te víṣuṇā agna eté  śivā́saḥ sánto áśivā abhūvan  ádhūrṣata svayám eté vácobhir  r̥jūyaté vr̥jinā́ni bruvántaḥ

translation.text: Agni, those friends of thine have turned them from thee: gracious of old, they have become ungracious. They have deceived themselves by their own speeches, uttering wicked words against the righteous.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यस्ते॑ अग्ने॒ नम॑सा य॒ज्ञमीट्ट॑ ऋ॒तं स पा॑त्यरु॒षस्य॒ वृष्णः॑ तस्य॒ क्षयः॑ पृ॒थुरा सा॒धुरे॑तु प्र॒सर्स्रा॑णस्य॒ नहु॑षस्य॒ शेषः॑
verses.transliteration: yás te agne námasā yajñám ī́ṭṭe-  r̥táṃ sápāty aruṣásya vŕ̥ṣṇaḥ  tásya kṣáyaḥ pr̥thúr ā́ sādhúr etu  prasársrāṇasya náhuṣasya śéṣaḥ

translation.text: He who pays sacrifice to thee with homage, O Agni, keeps the Red Steer's Law eternal; Wide is his dwelling. May the noble offspring of Nahusha who wandered forth come hither.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अर्च॑न्तस्त्वा हवाम॒हेऽर्च॑न्तः॒ समि॑धीमहि अग्ने॒ अर्च॑न्त ऊ॒तये॑
verses.transliteration: árcantas tvā havāmahe-  -árcantaḥ sám idhīmahi  ágne árcanta ūtáye

translation.text: WITH songs of praise we call on thee, we kindle thee with songs of praise, Agni, -with songs of praise, for help.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्नेः स्तोमं॑ मनामहे सि॒ध्रम॒द्य दि॑वि॒स्पृशः॑ दे॒वस्य॑ द्रविण॒स्यवः॑
verses.transliteration: agné stómam manāmahe  sidhrám adyá divispŕ̥śaḥ  devásya draviṇasyávaḥ

translation.text: Eager for wealth, we meditate Agni's effectual praise to-day, Praise of the God who touches heaven.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निर्जु॑षत नो॒ गिरो॒ होता॒ यो मानु॑षे॒ष्वा स य॑क्ष॒द्दैव्यं॒ जन॑म्
verses.transliteration: agnír juṣata no gíro  hótā yó mā́nuṣeṣv ā́  sá yakṣad daívyaṃ jánam

translation.text: May Agni, Priest among mankind, take pleasure in our songs of praise, And worship the Celestial Folk.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वम॑ग्ने स॒प्रथा॑ असि॒ जुष्टो॒ होता॒ वरे॑ण्यः त्वया॑ य॒ज्ञं वि त॑न्वते
verses.transliteration: tvám agne sapráthā asi  júṣṭo hótā váreṇyaḥ  tváyā yajñáṃ ví tanvate

translation.text: Thou, Agni, art spread widely forth, Priest dear and excellent; through thee Men make the sacrifice complete.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वाम॑ग्ने वाज॒सात॑मं॒ विप्रा॑ वर्धन्ति॒ सुष्टु॑तम् स नो॑ रास्व सु॒वीर्य॑म्
verses.transliteration: tvā́m agne vājasā́tamaṃ  víprā vardhanti súṣṭutam  sá no rāsva suvī́ryam

translation.text: Singers exalt thee, Agni, well lauded, best giver of our strength: So grant thou us heroic might.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अग्ने॑ ने॒मिर॒राँ इ॑व दे॒वाँस्त्वं प॑रि॒भूर॑सि आ राध॑श्चि॒त्रमृ॑ञ्जसे
verses.transliteration: ágne nemír arā́m̐ iva  devā́ṃs tvám paribhū́r asi  ā́ rā́dhaś citrám r̥ñjase

translation.text: Thou Agni, as the felly rings the spokes, encompassest the Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निं स्तोमे॑न बोधय समिधा॒नो अम॑र्त्यम् ह॒व्या दे॒वेषु॑ नो दधत्
verses.transliteration: agníṃ stómena bodhaya  samidhānó ámartyam  havyā́ devéṣu no dadhat

translation.text: ENKINDLING the Immortal, wake Agni with song of praise: may he bear our oblations to the Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तम॑ध्व॒रेष्वी॑ळते दे॒वं मर्ता॒ अम॑र्त्यम् यजि॑ष्ठं॒ मानु॑षे॒ जने॑
verses.transliteration: tám adhvaréṣv īḷate  devám mártā ámartyam  yájiṣṭham mā́nuṣe jáne

translation.text: At high solemnities mortal men glorify him the Immortal, best At sacrifice among mankind.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तं हि शश्व॑न्त॒ ईळ॑ते स्रु॒चा दे॒वं घृ॑त॒श्चुता॑ अ॒ग्निं ह॒व्याय॒ वोळ्ह॑वे
verses.transliteration: táṃ hí śáśvanta ī́ḷate  srucā́ deváṃ ghr̥taścútā  agníṃ havyā́ya vóḷhave

translation.text: That he may bear their gifts to heaven, all glorify him Agni, God, With ladle that distilleth oil.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निर्जा॒तो अ॑रोचत॒ घ्नन्दस्यू॒ञ्ज्योति॑षा॒ तमः॑ अवि॑न्द॒द्गा अ॒पः स्वः॑
verses.transliteration: agnír jātó arocata  ghnán dásyūñ jyótiṣā támaḥ  ávindad gā́ apáḥ svàḥ

translation.text: Agni shone bright when born, with light killing the Dasyus and the dark: He found the Kine, the Floods, the Sun.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निमी॒ळेन्यं॑ क॒विं घृ॒तपृ॑ष्ठं सपर्यत वेतु॑ मे शृ॒णव॒द्धव॑म्
verses.transliteration: agním īḷényaṃ kavíṃ  ghr̥tápr̥ṣṭhaṃ saparyata  vétu me śr̥ṇávad dhávam

translation.text: Serve Agni, God adorable, the Sage whose back is balmed with oil: Let him approach, and hear my call.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निं घृ॒तेन॑ वावृधुः॒ स्तोमे॑भिर्वि॒श्वच॑र्षणिम् स्वा॒धीभि॑र्वच॒स्युभिः॑
verses.transliteration: agníṃ ghr̥téna vāvr̥dhuḥ-  stómebhir viśvácarṣaṇim  svādhī́bhir vacasyúbhiḥ

translation.text: They have exalted Agni, God of all mankind, with oil and hymns Of praise, devout and eloquent.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र वे॒धसे॑ क॒वये॒ वेद्या॑य॒ गिरं॑ भरे य॒शसे॑ पू॒र्व्याय॑ घृ॒तप्र॑सत्तो॒ असु॑रः सु॒शेवो॑ रा॒यो ध॒र्ता ध॒रुणो॒ वस्वो॑ अ॒ग्निः
verses.transliteration: prá vedháse kaváye védyāya  gíram bhare yaśáse pūrvyā́ya  ghr̥táprasatto ásuraḥ suśévo  rāyó dhartā́ dharúṇo vásvo agníḥ

translation.text: To him, the far-renowned, the wise Ordainer, ancient and glorious, a song I offer. Enthroned in oil, the Asura, bliss-giver, is Agni, firm support of noble, riches.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ऋ॒तेन॑ ऋ॒तं ध॒रुणं॑ धारयन्त य॒ज्ञस्य॑ शा॒के प॑र॒मे व्यो॑मन् दि॒वो धर्म॑न्ध॒रुणे॑ से॒दुषो॒ नॄञ्जा॒तैरजा॑ताँ अ॒भि ये न॑न॒क्षुः
verses.transliteration: r̥téna r̥táṃ dharúṇaṃ dhārayanta  yajñásya śāké paramé vyòman  divó dhárman dharúṇe sedúṣo nr̥̄́ñ  jātaír ájātām̐ abhí yé nanakṣúḥ

translation.text: By holy Law they kept supporting Order, by help of sacrifice, in loftiest heaven,– They who attained with born men to the unborn, men seated on that stay, heaven's firm sustainer.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ङ्हो॒युव॑स्त॒न्व॑स्तन्वते॒ वि वयो॑ म॒हद्दु॒ष्टरं॑ पू॒र्व्याय॑ स सं॒वतो॒ नव॑जातस्तुतुर्यात्सि॒ङ्हं न क्रु॒द्धम॒भितः॒ परि॑ ष्ठुः
verses.transliteration: aṃhoyúvas tanvàs tanvate ví  váyo mahád duṣṭáram pūrvyā́ya  sá saṃváto návajātas tuturyāt  siṅháṃ ná kruddhám abhítaḥ pári ṣṭhuḥ

translation.text: Averting woe, they labour hard to bring him, the ancient, plenteous food as power resistless. May he, born newly, conquer his assailants: round him they stand as round an angry lion.

verses.sanskrit_deva: मा॒तेव॒ यद्भर॑से पप्रथा॒नो जनं॑जनं॒ धाय॑से॒ चक्ष॑से च वयो॑वयो जरसे॒ यद्दधा॑नः॒ परि॒ त्मना॒ विषु॑रूपो जिगासि
verses.transliteration: mātéva yád bhárase paprathānó  jánaṃ-janaṃ dhā́yase cákṣase ca  váyo-vayo jarase yád dádhānaḥ  pári tmánā víṣurūpo jigāsi

translation.text: When, like a mother, spreading forth to nourish, to cherish and regard each man that liveth,– Consuming all the strength that thou hast gotten, thou wanderest round, thyself, in varied fashion.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वाजो॒ नु ते॒ शव॑सस्पा॒त्वन्त॑मु॒रुं दोघं॑ ध॒रुणं॑ देव रा॒यः प॒दं न ता॒युर्गुहा॒ दधा॑नो म॒हो रा॒ये चि॒तय॒न्नत्रि॑मस्पः
verses.transliteration: vā́jo nú te śávasas pātv ántam  urúṃ dóghaṃ dharúṇaṃ deva rāyáḥ  padáṃ ná tāyúr gúhā dádhāno  mahó rāyé citáyann átrim aspaḥ

translation.text: May strength preserve the compass of thy vigour, God! that broad stream of thine that beareth riches. Thou, like a thief who keeps his refuge secret, hast holpen Atri to great wealth, by teaching.

verses.sanskrit_deva: बृ॒हद्वयो॒ हि भा॒नवेऽर्चा॑ दे॒वाया॒ग्नये॑ यं मि॒त्रं न प्रश॑स्तिभि॒र्मर्ता॑सो दधि॒रे पु॒रः
verses.transliteration: br̥hád váyo hí bhānáve-  -árcā devā́yāgnáye  yám mitráṃ ná práśastibhir  mártāso dadhiré puráḥ

translation.text: GREAT power is in the beam of light, sing praise to, Agni, to the God Whom men have set in foremost place like Mitra with their eulogies.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स हि द्युभि॒र्जना॑नां॒ होता॒ दक्ष॑स्य बा॒ह्वोः वि ह॒व्यम॒ग्निरा॑नु॒षग्भगो॒ न वार॑मृण्वति
verses.transliteration: sá hí dyúbhir jánānāṃ  hótā dákṣasya bāhvóḥ  ví havyám agnír ānuṣág  bhágo ná vā́ram r̥ṇvati

translation.text: He by the splendour of his arms is Priest of every able man. Agni conveys oblation straight, and deals, as Bhaga deals, his boons.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒स्य स्तोमे॑ म॒घोनः॑ स॒ख्ये वृ॒द्धशो॑चिषः विश्वा॒ यस्मि॑न्तुवि॒ष्वणि॒ सम॒र्ये शुष्म॑माद॒धुः
verses.transliteration: asyá stóme maghónaḥ  sakhyé vr̥ddháśociṣaḥ  víśvā yásmin tuviṣváṇi  sám aryé śúṣmam ādadhúḥ

translation.text: All rests upon the laud and love of him the rich, high-flaming God, On whom, loud-roaring, men have laid great strength as on a faithful friend.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अधा॒ ह्य॑ग्न एषां सु॒वीर्य॑स्य मं॒हना॑ तमिद्य॒ह्वं न रोद॑सी॒ परि॒ श्रवो॑ बभूवतुः
verses.transliteration: ádhā hy àgna eṣāṃ  suvī́ryasya maṃhánā  tám íd yahváṃ ná ródasī  pári śrávo babhūvatuḥ

translation.text: So, Agni, be the Friend of these with liberal gift of hero strength. Yea, Heaven and Earth have not surpassed this Youthful One in glorious fame.

verses.sanskrit_deva: नू न॒ एहि॒ वार्य॒मग्ने॑ गृणा॒न आ भ॑र ये व॒यं ये च॑ सू॒रयः॑ स्व॒स्ति धाम॑हे॒ सचो॒तैधि॑ पृ॒त्सु नो॑ वृ॒धे
verses.transliteration: nū́ na éhi vā́ryam  ágne gr̥ṇāná ā́ bhara  yé vayáṃ yé ca sūráyaḥ  svastí dhā́mahe sácā-  utaídhi pr̥tsú no vr̥dhé

translation.text: O Agni, quickly come to us, and, glorified, bring precious wealth. So we and these our princes will assemble for the good of all. Be near in fight to prosper us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ य॒ज्ञैर्दे॑व॒ मर्त्य॑ इ॒त्था तव्यां॑समू॒तये॑ अ॒ग्निं कृ॒ते स्व॑ध्व॒रे पू॒रुरी॑ळी॒ताव॑से
verses.transliteration: ā́ yajñaír deva mártyaḥ-  itthā́ távyāṃsam ūtáye  agníṃ kr̥té svadhvaré  pūrúr īḷītā́vase

translation.text: GOD, may a mortal call the Strong hither, with solemn rites, to aid, A man call Agni to protect when sacrifice is well prepared.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अस्य॒ हि स्वय॑शस्तर आ॒सा वि॑धर्म॒न्मन्य॑से तं नाकं॑ चि॒त्रशो॑चिषं म॒न्द्रं प॒रो म॑नी॒षया॑
verses.transliteration: ásya hí sváyaśastaraḥ-  āsā́ vidharman mányase  táṃ nā́kaṃ citráśociṣam  mandrám paró manīṣáyā

translation.text: Near him thou seemest mightier still in native glory, set to hold Apart yon flame-hued vault of heaven, lovely beyond the thought of man.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒स्य वासा उ॑ अ॒र्चिषा॒ य आयु॑क्त तु॒जा गि॒रा दि॒वो न यस्य॒ रेत॑सा बृ॒हच्छोच॑न्त्य॒र्चयः॑
verses.transliteration: asyá vā́sā́ u arcíṣā  yá ā́yukta tujā́ girā́  divó ná yásya rétasā  br̥hác chócanty arcáyaḥ

translation.text: Yea, this is by the light of him whom powerful siong hath bound to act, Whose bearns of splendour flash on high as though they sprang from heavenly seed.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒स्य क्रत्वा॒ विचे॑तसो द॒स्मस्य॒ वसु॒ रथ॒ आ अधा॒ विश्वा॑सु॒ हव्यो॒ऽग्निर्वि॒क्षु प्र श॑स्यते
verses.transliteration: asyá krátvā vícetaso  dasmásya vásu rátha ā́  ádhā víśvāsu hávyo  -agnír vikṣú prá śasyate

translation.text: Wealth loads the Wonder-Worker's car through his, the very wise One's power. Then, meet to be invoked among all tribes, is Agni ghorified.

verses.sanskrit_deva: नू न॒ इद्धि वार्य॑मा॒सा स॑चन्त सू॒रयः॑ ऊर्जो॑ नपाद॒भिष्ट॑ये पा॒हि श॒ग्धि स्व॒स्तय॑ उ॒तैधि॑ पृ॒त्सु नो॑ वृ॒धे
verses.transliteration: nū́ na íd dhí vā́ryam  āsā́ sacanta sūráyaḥ  ū́rjo napād abhíṣṭaye  pāhí śagdhí svastáyaḥ-  utaídhi pr̥tsú no vr̥dhé

translation.text: Now, too, the princes shall obtain excellent riches by our lips. Protect us for our welfare: lend thy succour, O thou Son of Strength. Be near in fight to prosper us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्रा॒तर॒ग्निः पु॑रुप्रि॒यो वि॒शः स्त॑वे॒ताति॑थिः विश्वा॑नि॒ यो अम॑र्त्यो ह॒व्या मर्ते॑षु॒ रण्य॑ति
verses.transliteration: prātár agníḥ purupriyó  viśá stavetā́tithiḥ  víśvāni yó ámartyo  havyā́ márteṣu ráṇyati

translation.text: AT dawn let: Agni, much-beloved guest of the house, be glorified; Immortal who delights in all oblations brought by mortal men.

verses.sanskrit_deva: द्वि॒ताय॑ मृ॒क्तवा॑हसे॒ स्वस्य॒ दक्ष॑स्य मं॒हना॑ इन्दुं॒ स ध॑त्त आनु॒षक्स्तो॒ता चि॑त्ते अमर्त्य
verses.transliteration: dvitā́ya mr̥ktávāhase  svásya dákṣasya maṃhánā  índuṃ sá dhatta ānuṣák  stotā́ cit te amartya

translation.text: For Dvita who receives through wealth of native strength maimed offerings, Thy praiser even gains at once the Soma-drops, Immortal Gods!

verses.sanskrit_deva: तं वो॑ दी॒र्घायु॑शोचिषं गि॒रा हु॑वे म॒घोना॑म् अरि॑ष्टो॒ येषां॒ रथो॒ व्य॑श्वदाव॒न्नीय॑ते
verses.transliteration: táṃ vo dīrghā́yuśociṣaṃ  girā́ huve maghónām  áriṣṭo yéṣāṃ rátho  vy àśvadāvann ī́yate

translation.text: Nobles, with song I call that car of yours that shines with lengthened life, For, God who givest steeds! that car hither and thither goes unharmed.

verses.sanskrit_deva: चि॒त्रा वा॒ येषु॒ दीधि॑तिरा॒सन्नु॒क्था पान्ति॒ ये स्ती॒र्णं ब॒र्हिः स्व॑र्णरे॒ श्रवां॑सि दधिरे॒ परि॑
verses.transliteration: citrā́ vā yéṣu dī́dhitir  āsánn ukthā́ pā́nti yé  stīrṇám barhíḥ svàrṇare  śrávāṃsi dadhire pári

translation.text: They who have varied ways of thought, who guard, the lauds within their lips, And strew the grass before the light, have decked themselves with high renown.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ये मे॑ पञ्चा॒शतं॑ द॒दुरश्वा॑नां स॒धस्तु॑ति द्यु॒मद॑ग्ने॒ महि॒ श्रवो॑ बृ॒हत्कृ॑धि म॒घोनां॑ नृ॒वद॑मृत नृ॒णाम्
verses.transliteration: yé me pañcāśátaṃ dadúr  áśvānāṃ sadhástuti  dyumád agne máhi śrávo  br̥hát kr̥dhi maghónāṃ  nr̥vád amr̥ta nr̥ṇā́m

translation.text: Immortal Agni, give the chiefs, heroes who institute the rite, Heroes' illustrious, lofty fame, who at the synod met for praise presented me with fifty steeds.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भ्य॑व॒स्थाः प्र जा॑यन्ते॒ प्र व॒व्रेर्व॒व्रिश्चि॑केत उ॒पस्थे॑ मा॒तुर्वि च॑ष्टे
verses.transliteration: abhy àvasthā́ḥ prá jāyante  prá vavrér vavríś ciketa  upásthe mātúr ví caṣṭe

translation.text: ONE state begets another state: husk is made visible from husk: Within his Mother's side he speaks.

verses.sanskrit_deva: जु॒हु॒रे वि चि॒तय॒न्तोऽनि॑मिषं नृ॒म्णं पा॑न्ति आ दृ॒ळ्हां पुरं॑ विविशुः
verses.transliteration: juhuré ví citáyantaḥ-  -ánimiṣaṃ nr̥mṇám pānti  ā́ dr̥ḷhā́m púraṃ viviśuḥ

translation.text: Discerning, have they offered gifts: they guard the strength that never wastes. To a strong fort have they pressed in.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ श्वै॑त्रे॒यस्य॑ ज॒न्तवो॑ द्यु॒मद्व॑र्धन्त कृ॒ष्टयः॑ नि॒ष्कग्री॑वो बृ॒हदु॑क्थ ए॒ना मध्वा॒ न वा॑ज॒युः
verses.transliteration: ā́ śvaitreyásya jantávo  dyumád vardhanta kr̥ṣṭáyaḥ  niṣkágrīvo br̥hádukthaḥ-  enā́ mádhvā ná vājayúḥ

translation.text: Ṣvaitreya's people, all his men, have gloriously increased in might. A gold chain Br̥ihaduktha wears, as, through this Soma, seeking spoil.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्रि॒यं दु॒ग्धं न काम्य॒मजा॑मि जा॒म्योः सचा॑ घ॒र्मो न वाज॑जठ॒रोऽद॑ब्धः॒ शश्व॑तो॒ दभः॑
verses.transliteration: priyáṃ dugdháṃ ná kā́myam  ájāmi jāmyóḥ sácā  gharmó ná vā́jajaṭharaḥ-  -ádabdhaḥ śáśvato dábhaḥ

translation.text: I bring, as 'twere, the longed-for milk, the dear milk of the Sister-Pair. Like to a caldron filled with food is he, unconquered, conquering all.

verses.sanskrit_deva: क्रीळ॑न्नो रश्म॒ आ भु॑वः॒ सं भस्म॑ना वा॒युना॒ वेवि॑दानः ता अ॑स्य सन्धृ॒षजो॒ न ति॒ग्माः सुसं॑शिता व॒क्ष्यो॑ वक्षणे॒स्थाः
verses.transliteration: krī́ḷan no raśma ā́ bhuvaḥ  sám bhásmanā vāyúnā vévidānaḥ  tā́ asya san dhr̥ṣájo ná tigmā́ḥ  súsaṃśitā vakṣyò vakṣaṇesthā́ḥ

translation.text: Beam of light, come to us in sportive fashion, finding thyself close to the wind that fans thee. These flames of his are wasting flames, like arrows keen-pointed, sharpened, on his breast.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यम॑ग्ने वाजसातम॒ त्वं चि॒न्मन्य॑से र॒यिम् तं नो॑ गी॒र्भिः श्र॒वाय्यं॑ देव॒त्रा प॑नया॒ युज॑म्
verses.transliteration: yám agne vājasātama  tváṃ cin mányase rayím  táṃ no gīrbhíḥ śravā́yyaṃ  devatrā́ panayā yújam

translation.text: AGNI, best winner of the spoil, cause us to praise before the Gods As our associate meet for lauds, wealth which thou verily deemest wealth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ये अ॑ग्ने॒ नेरय॑न्ति ते वृ॒द्धा उ॒ग्रस्य॒ शव॑सः अप॒ द्वेषो॒ अप॒ ह्वरो॒ऽन्यव्र॑तस्य सश्चिरे
verses.transliteration: yé agne néráyanti te  vr̥ddhā́ ugrásya śávasaḥ  ápa dvéṣo ápa hváro  -anyávratasya saścire

translation.text: Agni, the great who ward not off the anger of thy power and might Stir up the wrath and hatred due to one who holds an alien creed.

verses.sanskrit_deva: होता॑रं त्वा वृणीम॒हेऽग्ने॒ दक्ष॑स्य॒ साध॑नम् य॒ज्ञेषु॑ पू॒र्व्यं गि॒रा प्रय॑स्वन्तो हवामहे
verses.transliteration: hótāraṃ tvā vr̥ṇīmahe-  -ágne dákṣasya sā́dhanam  yajñéṣu pūrvyáṃ girā́  práyasvanto havāmahe

translation.text: Thee, Agni, would we choose as Priest, the perfecter of strength and skill; We who bring sacred food invoke with song thee Chief at holy rites.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒त्था यथा॑ त ऊ॒तये॒ सह॑सावन्दि॒वेदि॑वे रा॒य ऋ॒ताय॑ सुक्रतो॒ गोभिः॑ ष्याम सध॒मादो॑ वी॒रैः स्या॑म सध॒मादः॑
verses.transliteration: itthā́ yáthā ta ūtáye  sáhasāvan divé-dive  rāyá r̥tā́ya sukrato  góbhiḥ ṣyāma sadhamā́do  vīraíḥ syāma sadhamā́daḥ

translation.text: Here as is needful for thine aid we toil, O Conqueror, day by day, For wealth, for Law. May we rejoice, Most Wise One! at the feast, with kine, rejoice, with heroes, at the feast.

verses.sanskrit_deva: म॒नु॒ष्वत्त्वा॒ नि धी॑महि मनु॒ष्वत्समि॑धीमहि अग्ने॑ मनु॒ष्वद॑ङ्गिरो दे॒वान्दे॑वय॒ते य॑ज
verses.transliteration: manuṣvát tvā ní dhīmahi  manuṣvát sám idhīmahi  ágne manuṣvád aṅgiro  devā́n devayaté yaja

translation.text: WE stablish thee as Manus used, as Manus used we kindle thee. Like Manus, for the pious man , Angiras, Agni, worship Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं हि मानु॑षे॒ जनेऽग्ने॒ सुप्री॑त इ॒ध्यसे॑ स्रुच॑स्त्वा यन्त्यानु॒षक्सुजा॑त॒ सर्पि॑रासुते
verses.transliteration: tváṃ hí mā́nuṣe jáne-  -ágne súprīta idhyáse  srúcas tvā yanty ānuṣák  sújāta sárpirāsute

translation.text: For well, O Agni, art thou pleased when thou art kindled mid mankind. Straight go the ladles unto thee, thou highborn God whose food is oil.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वां विश्वे॑ स॒जोष॑सो दे॒वासो॑ दू॒तम॑क्रत स॒प॒र्यन्त॑स्त्वा कवे य॒ज्ञेषु॑ दे॒वमी॑ळते
verses.transliteration: tvā́ṃ víśve sajóṣaso  devā́so dūtám akrata  saparyántas tvā kave  yajñéṣu devám īḷate

translation.text: Thee have all Gods of one accord established as their messenger. Serving at sacrifices men adore thee as a God, O Sage.

verses.sanskrit_deva: दे॒वं वो॑ देवय॒ज्यया॒ग्निमी॑ळीत॒ मर्त्यः॑ समि॑द्धः शुक्र दीदिह्यृ॒तस्य॒ योनि॒मास॑दः स॒सस्य॒ योनि॒मास॑दः
verses.transliteration: deváṃ vo devayajyáyā-  -agním īḷīta mártyaḥ  sámiddhaḥ śukra dīdihi-  r̥tásya yónim ā́sadaḥ  sasásya yónim ā́sadaḥ

translation.text: Let mortal man adore your God, Agni, with worship due to Gods. Shine forth enkindled, Radiant One. Sit in the chamber of the Law, sit in the chamber of the food.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र वि॑श्वसामन्नत्रि॒वदर्चा॑ पाव॒कशो॑चिषे यो अ॑ध्व॒रेष्वीड्यो॒ होता॑ म॒न्द्रत॑मो वि॒शि
verses.transliteration: prá viśvasāmann atrivád  árcā pāvakáśociṣe  yó adhvaréṣv ī́ḍyo  hótā mandrátamo viśí

translation.text: LIKE Atri, Viṣvasâman! sing to him of purifying light, Who must be praised in holy rites, the Priest most welcome in the house.

verses.sanskrit_deva: न्य१॒॑ग्निं जा॒तवे॑दसं॒ दधा॑ता दे॒वमृ॒त्विज॑म् प्र य॒ज्ञ ए॑त्वानु॒षग॒द्या दे॒वव्य॑चस्तमः
verses.transliteration: ny àgníṃ jātávedasaṃ  dádhātā devám r̥tvíjam  prá yajñá etv ānuṣág  adyā́ devávyacastamaḥ

translation.text: Set Jâtavedas in his place, Agni the God and Minister. Let sacrifice proceed to-day duly, comprising all the Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: चि॒कि॒त्विन्म॑नसं त्वा दे॒वं मर्ता॑स ऊ॒तये॑ वरे॑ण्यस्य॒ तेऽव॑स इया॒नासो॑ अमन्महि
verses.transliteration: cikitvínmanasaṃ tvā  devám mártāsa ūtáye  váreṇyasya té 'vasaḥ-  iyānā́so amanmahi

translation.text: All mortals come to thee for aid, the God of most observant mind. Of thine excelling favour we bethink us as we long for it.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अग्ने॑ चिकि॒द्ध्य१॒॑स्य न॑ इ॒दं वचः॑ सहस्य तं त्वा॑ सुशिप्र दम्पते॒ स्तोमै॑र्वर्ध॒न्त्यत्र॑यो गी॒र्भिः शु॑म्भ॒न्त्यत्र॑यः
verses.transliteration: ágne cikiddhy àsyá naḥ-  idáṃ vácaḥ sahasya  táṃ tvā suśipra dampate  stómair vardhanty átrayo  gīrbhíḥ śumbhanty átrayaḥ

translation.text: Mark with attention this our speech, O Agni, thou victorious One. Thee, Strong-jawed! as the homestead's Lord, the Atris with their lauds exalt, the Atris beautify with songs.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अग्ने॒ सह॑न्त॒मा भ॑र द्यु॒म्नस्य॑ प्रा॒सहा॑ र॒यिम् विश्वा॒ यश्च॑र्ष॒णीर॒भ्या॒३॒॑सा वाजे॑षु सा॒सह॑त्
verses.transliteration: ágne sáhantam ā́ bhara  dyumnásya prāsáhā rayím  víśvā yáś carṣaṇī́r abhí  -āsā́ vā́jeṣu sāsáhat

translation.text: By thy fair splendour's mighty power, O Agni, bring victorious wealth, Wealth that o'ercometh all mankind, and, near us, conquereth in fight.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तम॑ग्ने पृतना॒षहं॑ र॒यिं स॑हस्व॒ आ भ॑र त्वं हि स॒त्यो अद्भु॑तो दा॒ता वाज॑स्य॒ गोम॑तः
verses.transliteration: tám agne pr̥tanāṣáhaṃ  rayíṃ sahasva ā́ bhara  tváṃ hí satyó ádbhuto  dātā́ vā́jasya gómataḥ

translation.text: Victorious Agni, bring to us the wealth that vanquisheth in war; For thou art wonderful and true, giver of strength in herds of kine.

verses.sanskrit_deva: विश्वे॒ हि त्वा॑ स॒जोष॑सो॒ जना॑सो वृ॒क्तब॑र्हिषः होता॑रं॒ सद्म॑सु प्रि॒यं व्यन्ति॒ वार्या॑ पु॒रु
verses.transliteration: víśve hí tvā sajóṣaso  jánāso vr̥ktábarhiṣaḥ  hótāraṃ sádmasu priyáṃ  vyánti vā́ryā purú

translation.text: For all the folk with one accord, whose sacred grass is trimmed and strewn, Invite thee to their worship-halls, as a dear Priest, for choicest wealth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स हि ष्मा॑ वि॒श्वच॑र्षणिर॒भिमा॑ति॒ सहो॑ द॒धे अग्न॑ ए॒षु क्षये॒ष्वा रे॒वन्नः॑ शुक्र दीदिहि द्यु॒मत्पा॑वक दीदिहि
verses.transliteration: sá hí ṣmā viśvácarṣaṇir  abhímāti sáho dadhé  ágna eṣú kṣáyeṣv~ā́  reván naḥ śukra dīdihi  dyumát pāvaka dīdihi

translation.text: For he, the God of all men, hath gotten him might that quelleth foes. O Agni, in these homes shine forth, bright God! for our prosperity, shine, Purifier! splendidly.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अग्ने॒ त्वं नो॒ अन्त॑म उ॒त त्रा॒ता शि॒वो भ॑वा वरू॒थ्यः॑
verses.transliteration: ágne tváṃ no ántamaḥ-  utá trātā́ śivó bhavā varūthyàḥ

translation.text: O AGNI, be our nearest Friend, be thou a kind deliverer and a gracious Friend.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वसु॑र॒ग्निर्वसु॑श्रवा॒ अच्छा॑ नक्षि द्यु॒मत्त॑मं र॒यिं दाः॑
verses.transliteration: vásur agnír vásuśravāḥ-  áchā nakṣi dyumáttamaṃ rayíṃ dāḥ

translation.text: Excellent Agni, come thou nigh to us, and give us wealth most splendidly renowned.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स नो॑ बोधि श्रु॒धी हव॑मुरु॒ष्या णो॑ अघाय॒तः स॑मस्मात्
verses.transliteration: sá no bodhi śrudhī́ hávam  uruṣyā́ ṇo aghāyatáḥ samasmāt

translation.text: So hear us, listen to this call of ours, and keep us far from every sinful man.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तं त्वा॑ शोचिष्ठ दीदिवः सु॒म्नाय॑ नू॒नमी॑महे॒ सखि॑भ्यः
verses.transliteration: táṃ tvā śociṣṭha dīdivaḥ  sumnā́ya nūnám īmahe sákhibhyaḥ

translation.text: To thee then, O Most Bright, O Radiant God, we come with prayer for happiness for our friends.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अच्छा॑ वो अ॒ग्निमव॑से दे॒वं गा॑सि॒ स नो॒ वसुः॑ रास॑त्पु॒त्र ऋ॑षू॒णामृ॒तावा॑ पर्षति द्वि॒षः
verses.transliteration: áchā vo agním ávase  deváṃ gāsi sá no vásuḥ  rā́sat putrá r̥ṣūṇā́m  r̥tā́vā parṣati dviṣáḥ

translation.text: I WILL sing near, for grace, your God Agni, for he is good to us. Son of the Brands, may he give gifts, and, righteous, save us from the foe.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स हि स॒त्यो यं पूर्वे॑ चिद्दे॒वास॑श्चि॒द्यमी॑धि॒रे होता॑रं म॒न्द्रजि॑ह्व॒मित्सु॑दी॒तिभि॑र्वि॒भाव॑सुम्
verses.transliteration: sá hí satyó yám pū́rve cid  devā́saś cid yám īdhiré  hótāram mandrájihvam ít  sudītíbhir vibhā́vasum

translation.text: For be is true, whpm men of old enkindled, and the Gods themselves, The Priest with the delicious tongue, rich with the light of glorious beams.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स नो॑ धी॒ती वरि॑ष्ठया॒ श्रेष्ठ॑या च सुम॒त्या अग्ने॑ रा॒यो दि॑दीहि नः सुवृ॒क्तिभि॑र्वरेण्य
verses.transliteration: sá no dhītī́ váriṣṭhayā  śréṣṭhayā ca sumatyā́  ágne rāyó didīhi naḥ  suvr̥ktíbhir vareṇya

translation.text: With wisdom that surpasseth all, with gracious will most excellent, O Agni, worthy of our choice, shine wealth on us through hymns of praise.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निर्दे॒वेषु॑ राजत्य॒ग्निर्मर्ते॑ष्वावि॒शन् अ॒ग्निर्नो॑ हव्य॒वाह॑नो॒ऽग्निं धी॒भिः स॑पर्यत
verses.transliteration: agnír devéṣu rājati-  agnír márteṣv āviśán  agnír no havyavā́hano  -agníṃ dhībhíḥ saparyata

translation.text: Agni is King, for he extends to mortals and to Gods alike. Agni is bearer of our gifts. Worship ye Agni with your thoughts.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निस्तु॒विश्र॑वस्तमं तु॒विब्र॑ह्माणमुत्त॒मम् अ॒तूर्तं॑ श्राव॒यत्प॑तिं पु॒त्रं द॑दाति दा॒शुषे॑
verses.transliteration: agnís tuvíśravastamaṃ  tuvíbrahmāṇam uttamám  atū́rtaṃ śrāvayátpatim  putráṃ dadāti dāśúṣe

translation.text: Agni gives to the worshipper a son, the best, of mightiest fame, Of deep devotion, ne'er subdued, bringer of glory to his sire.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निर्द॑दाति॒ सत्प॑तिं सा॒साह॒ यो यु॒धा नृभिः॑ अ॒ग्निरत्यं॑ रघु॒ष्यदं॒ जेता॑र॒मप॑राजितम्
verses.transliteration: agnír dadāti sátpatiṃ  sāsā́ha yó yudhā́ nŕ̥bhiḥ  agnír átyaṃ raghuṣyádaṃ  jétāram áparājitam

translation.text: Agni bestows the hero-lord who conquers with the men in fight. Agni bestows the fleet-foot steed, the victor never overcome.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यद्वाहि॑ष्ठं॒ तद॒ग्नये॑ बृ॒हद॑र्च विभावसो महि॑षीव॒ त्वद्र॒यिस्त्वद्वाजा॒ उदी॑रते
verses.transliteration: yád vā́hiṣṭhaṃ tád agnáye  br̥hád arca vibhāvaso  máhiṣīva tvád rayís  tvád vā́jā úd īrate

translation.text: The mightiest song is Agni's: shine on high, thou who art rich in light. Like the Chief Consort of a King, riches and strength proceed -from thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तव॑ द्यु॒मन्तो॑ अ॒र्चयो॒ ग्रावे॑वोच्यते बृ॒हत् उ॒तो ते॑ तन्य॒तुर्य॑था स्वा॒नो अ॑र्त॒ त्मना॑ दि॒वः
verses.transliteration: táva dyumánto arcáyo  grā́vevocyate br̥hát  utó te tanyatúr yathā  svānó arta tmánā diváḥ

translation.text: Resplendent are thy rays of light: loud is thy voice like pressing-stones. Yea, of itself thy thunder goes forth like the roaring of the heaven.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒वाँ अ॒ग्निं व॑सू॒यवः॑ सहसा॒नं व॑वन्दिम स नो॒ विश्वा॒ अति॒ द्विषः॒ पर्ष॑न्ना॒वेव॑ सु॒क्रतुः॑
verses.transliteration: evā́m̐ agníṃ vasūyávaḥ  sahasānáṃ vavandima  sá no víśvā áti dvíṣaḥ  párṣan nāvéva sukrátuḥ

translation.text: Thus, seeking riches, have we paid homage to Agni Conqueror. May he, most wise, as with a ship, carry us over all our foes.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अग्ने॑ पावक रो॒चिषा॑ म॒न्द्रया॑ देव जि॒ह्वया॑ आ दे॒वान्व॑क्षि॒ यक्षि॑ च
verses.transliteration: ágne pāvaka rocíṣā  mandráyā deva jihváyā  ā́ devā́n vakṣi yákṣi ca

translation.text: O AGNI, Holy and Divine, with splendour and thy pleasant tongue Bring hither and adore the Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तं त्वा॑ घृतस्नवीमहे॒ चित्र॑भानो स्व॒र्दृश॑म् दे॒वाँ आ वी॒तये॑ वह
verses.transliteration: táṃ tvā ghr̥tasnav īmahe  cítrabhāno svardŕ̥śam  devā́m̐ ā́ vītáye vaha

translation.text: We pray thee, thou who droppest oil, bright-rayed! who lookest on the Sun, Bring the Gods hither to the feast.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वी॒तिहो॑त्रं त्वा कवे द्यु॒मन्तं॒ समि॑धीमहि अग्ने॑ बृ॒हन्त॑मध्व॒रे
verses.transliteration: vītíhotraṃ tvā kave  dyumántaṃ sám idhīmahi  ágne br̥hántam adhvaré

translation.text: We have enkindled thee, O Sage, bright caller of the Gods to feast. O Agni, great in Sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अग्ने॒ विश्वे॑भि॒रा ग॑हि दे॒वेभि॑र्ह॒व्यदा॑तये होता॑रं त्वा वृणीमहे
verses.transliteration: ágne víśvebhir ā́ gahi  devébhir havyádātaye  hótāraṃ tvā vr̥ṇīmahe-

translation.text: O Agni, come with all the Gods, come to our sacrificial gift: We choose thee as Invoking Priest.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यज॑मानाय सुन्व॒त आग्ने॑ सु॒वीर्यं॑ वह दे॒वैरा स॑त्सि ब॒र्हिषि॑
verses.transliteration: yájamānāya sunvaté-  ā́gne suvī́ryaṃ vaha  devaír ā́ satsi barhíṣi

translation.text: Bring, Agni, to the worshipper who pours the juice, heroic strength: Sit with the Gods upon the grass.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स॒मि॒धा॒नः स॑हस्रजि॒दग्ने॒ धर्मा॑णि पुष्यसि दे॒वानां॑ दू॒त उ॒क्थ्यः॑
verses.transliteration: samidhānáḥ sahasrajid  ágne dhármāṇi puṣyasi  devā́nāṃ dūtá ukthyàḥ

translation.text: Victor of thousands, Agni, thou, enkindled, cherishest the laws, Laud-worthy, envoy of the Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: न्य१॒॑ग्निं जा॒तवे॑दसं होत्र॒वाहं॒ यवि॑ष्ठ्यम् दधा॑ता दे॒वमृ॒त्विज॑म्
verses.transliteration: ny àgníṃ jātávedasaṃ  hotravā́haṃ yáviṣṭhyam  dádhātā devám r̥tvíjam

translation.text: Set Agni Jâtavedas down, the bearer of our sacred gifts, MostYouthful, God and Minister.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र य॒ज्ञ ए॑त्वानु॒षग॒द्या दे॒वव्य॑चस्तमः स्तृ॒णी॒त ब॒र्हिरा॒सदे॑
verses.transliteration: prá yajñá etv ānuṣág  adyā́ devávyacastamaḥ  str̥ṇītá barhír āsáde

translation.text: Duly proceed our sacrifice, comprising all the Gods, to-day: Strew holy grass to be their seat.

verses.sanskrit_deva: एदं म॒रुतो॑ अ॒श्विना॑ मि॒त्रः सी॑दन्तु॒ वरु॑णः दे॒वासः॒ सर्व॑या वि॒शा
verses.transliteration: édám marúto aśvínā  mitráḥ sīdantu váruṇaḥ  devā́saḥ sárvayā viśā́

translation.text: So may the Maruts sit thereon, the Aṣvins, Mitra, Varuṇa: The Gods with all their company.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अन॑स्वन्ता॒ सत्प॑तिर्मामहे मे॒ गावा॒ चेति॑ष्ठो॒ असु॑रो म॒घोनः॑ त्रै॒वृ॒ष्णो अ॑ग्ने द॒शभिः॑ स॒हस्रै॒र्वैश्वा॑नर॒ त्र्य॑रुणश्चिकेत
verses.transliteration: ánasvantā sátpatir māmahe me  gā́vā cétiṣṭho ásuro maghónaḥ  traivr̥ṣṇó agne daśábhiḥ sahásrair  vaíśvānara tryàruṇaś ciketa

translation.text: THE Godlike hero, famousest of nobles, hath granted me two oxen with a wagon. Trivr̥ishan's son Tryaruṇa hath distinguished himself, Vaiṣvânara Agni! with ten thousands.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यो मे॑ श॒ता च॑ विंश॒तिं च॒ गोनां॒ हरी॑ च यु॒क्ता सु॒धुरा॒ ददा॑ति वैश्वा॑नर॒ सुष्टु॑तो वावृधा॒नोऽग्ने॒ यच्छ॒ त्र्य॑रुणाय॒ शर्म॑
verses.transliteration: yó me śatā́ ca viṃśatíṃ ca gónāṃ  hárī ca yuktā́ sudhúrā dádāti  vaíśvānara súṣṭuto vāvr̥dhānó  -ágne yácha tryàruṇāya śárma
